tls:text.tls:line: Was it correct to resign in favour of Huán?

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a son receives his status from his father;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a son receives his status from his father;

sense.def: receive N1 from N2 受之父母

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a son receives his status from his father;

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a son receives his status from his father;

sense.def: a father in general

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a feudal prince receives his status from his lord.

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a feudal prince receives his status from his lord.

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a feudal prince receives his status from his lord.

sense.def: (generalising, non-referential) a feudal lord [I include all examples that I feel deserve consideration in this connection. Many are questionable, but all can throw light on the problem of the plural/singular an definite/indefinite problem. These attributions are all being reworked.CH]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a feudal prince receives his status from his lord.

sense.def: receive N1 from N2 受之父母

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a feudal prince receives his status from his lord.

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is a feudal prince receives his status from his lord.

sense.def: the ruler as being primarily administratively in charge of people

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: Having abrogated the human relationships determined by Heaven

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: Having abrogated the human relationships determined by Heaven

sense.def: reject, dismiss; disregard, fail to obey (orders); discard; eliminate, remove

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: Having abrogated the human relationships determined by Heaven

sense.def: Heaven-assigned; by the grace of Heaven; heavenly; divine

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: Having abrogated the human relationships determined by Heaven

sense.def: fundamental human relations; moral standards of social behaviour

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: and having forgotten his ruler and father

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: and having forgotten his ruler and father

sense.def: forget about> ignore, neglect; disregard (sometimes: the fact that S); fail to pay proper careful attention to, heed, fail to be mindful of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: and having forgotten his ruler and father

sense.def: the ruler, my father; the ruler and father

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to perform an act of small kindness,

sense.def: intending thereby to, in order to; in order to; so that one can

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to perform an act of small kindness,

sense.def: do; enact

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to perform an act of small kindness,

sense.def: abstractly: slight, insignificant (mistakes etc); minor

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to perform an act of small kindness,

sense.def: act(s) of public generosity

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: [Yiin] (p.70) may be said to have followed a small path.

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: [Yiin] (p.70) may be said to have followed a small path.

sense.def: abstractly: slight, insignificant (mistakes etc); minor

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.06; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: [Yiin] (p.70) may be said to have followed a small path.

sense.def: mass noun that can be counted and specified as being somebody's: way, or the way of doing something; ways (of the world)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: A man like Yiin

sense.def: be like, resemble

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: may be said to have made light of a state of a thousand chariots,

sense.def: may properly be VERBED, should in effect be VERBED

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: may be said to have made light of a state of a thousand chariots,

sense.def: be properly called V; be said to V 可謂

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: may be said to have made light of a state of a thousand chariots,

sense.def: make light of; think little of; be not afraid of; to slight, hold in disrespect, to fail to show the proper respect for (the law etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: may be said to have made light of a state of a thousand chariots,

sense.def: one thousand

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: may be said to have made light of a state of a thousand chariots,

sense.def: war chariot; carriage with four horses; 魯國堯:一车四马为一乘。当时战争的形式主要是车战，一辆兵车由四匹马拉，车上有三名武装战士，后有若干步兵。古代常以兵车的多少衡量诸侯国或卿大夫封邑的大小。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: may be said to have made light of a state of a thousand chariots,

sense.def: (in general:) the state

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: while he was not yet able to

sense.def: tread on (abstract object "Goodness")

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: while he was not yet able to

sense.def: the (morally correct) Way; the proper non-substance-like abstract metaphysical principle ensuring that all is well in the world

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: tread the right way.

sense.def: 聖則吾不能'As for becoming a sage, that is what I am not able of.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: tread the right way.

sense.def: be not quite right, be not quite sufficient to express the truth; not yet

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.07; ssj: 1535; Zhong 1996: 6; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 69;

tls:text.tls:line: tread the right way.

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence; in later prose sometimes emphatic, especially in the construction 是...也.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.08; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: 1.2 In the third month

sense.def: three N; three kinds of Nab

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.08; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: 1.2 In the third month

sense.def: in the third month

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.08; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and Yi-fuu of Juliuh made a covenant on Mieh.

sense.def: ruler - not necessarily of the status of a Duke

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.08; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and Yi-fuu of Juliuh made a covenant on Mieh.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.08; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and Yi-fuu of Juliuh made a covenant on Mieh.

sense.def: swear a formal oath of allegiance (of several subjects)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.08; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and Yi-fuu of Juliuh made a covenant on Mieh.

sense.def: on

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)

tls:text.tls:line: What is meant by the term jí?

sense.def: what is (the subject)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [It indicates that] the Interior (i.e. the state of Luu) took the initiative with regard to this meeting.

sense.def: SHI, the inside; the inner chambers; ZUO: those inside; Inside the State

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [It indicates that] the Interior (i.e. the state of Luu) took the initiative with regard to this meeting.

sense.def: undertake; do deliberately (something right or something wrong), commit (a crime etc); act out (a virtue); conduct (government); engage in (thievery); set out to do

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [It indicates that] the Interior (i.e. the state of Luu) took the initiative with regard to this meeting.

sense.def: aspiration for N; initiative for; concern for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [It indicates that] the Interior (i.e. the state of Luu) took the initiative with regard to this meeting.

sense.def: intention; attention with respect to future action; wishes

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [It indicates that] the Interior (i.e. the state of Luu) took the initiative with regard to this meeting.

sense.def: contraction for 於之: in it; from it; to it; than it; by it

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: is [his] style.

sense.def: courtesy name

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: is [his] style.

sense.def: is to be classified as N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: has approximately the same meaning as fù ('teacher').

sense.def: copula-like verb: be like; be no better than

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: has approximately the same meaning as fù ('teacher').

sense.def: grand tutor

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: has approximately the same meaning as fù ('teacher').

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence; in later prose sometimes emphatic, especially in the construction 是...也.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: It is an honorific designation used by men.

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

sense.def: person of male sex; often: adult male (suitable for military or civil service)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: It is an honorific designation used by men.

sense.def: NP2 is associated with or inherently belongs to NP1 草木之名

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: It is an honorific designation used by men.

sense.def: commendatory, positive

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: It is an honorific designation used by men.

sense.def: designation for N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)

sense.def: (in subordinate sentences) he, she, it, they

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: Why

sense.def: articulate, express; propose; maintain, propose as true; pronounce on, speak up on, speak of (other's bad points); (abstractly) speak of (orally or in writing); inform of; suggest (often formally at court)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.09; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 8; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.10; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 9; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: Form oldest times Ju was as insiginificant state

sense.def: high 上古 "high antiquity" 上世 [note the connotation of elevated significance of high antiquity]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.10; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 9; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.10; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 9; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: Form oldest times Ju was as insiginificant state

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.10; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 9; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [the rulers of] which had not received investiture from the Jou [king].

sense.def: never 未之V也 as a pattern tends to mean "have never Ved it"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.10; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 9; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [the rulers of] which had not received investiture from the Jou [king].

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.10; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 9; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [the rulers of] which had not received investiture from the Jou [king].

tls:text.tls:line: [The Chuenchiou] therefore represents Duann as mean and [at the same time] aggravates [the crime of] the earl of Jenq.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.13; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [The Chuenchiou] therefore represents Duann as mean and [at the same time] aggravates [the crime of] the earl of Jenq.

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence; in later prose sometimes emphatic, especially in the construction 是...也.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.13; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

sense.def: younger brother; younger brothers

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.13; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.13; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

sense.def: declare to be morally inferior

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.13; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

sense.def: be hard on; raise serious critical objections against someone; make grave charges against someone; pass strong negative judgment against somneone

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.13; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

sense.def: 秦伯third of the feudal ranks, 公侯伯子男，"earl"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: What was there to aggravate with regard to [the crime of] the earl of Jenq?

sense.def: what (object?)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: What was there to aggravate with regard to [the crime of] the earl of Jenq?

sense.def: from; in; at; than (= 於)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: What was there to aggravate with regard to [the crime of] the earl of Jenq?

sense.def: 秦伯third of the feudal ranks, 公侯伯子男，"earl"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: [The Chuenchiou] aggravates the fact that the earl of Jenq had for a long time been determined in his heart

sense.def: be hard on, be especially hard on

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶曰取之其母之懷中而殺之云爾，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: It is the same as to say that the [the earl of Jenq] took a child from its mother's arms and killed it (e).

sense.def: be like V-ing; be as if V-ing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: Since this is so, what course of action would have been proper for the earl of Jenq?

sense.def: this being so, on the other hand...; if that is how things stand, then...; in that case, then...

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: To be lax in one's pursuit and let escape the culprit,

sense.def: in a slow and lax manner

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: To be lax in one's pursuit and let escape the culprit,

sense.def: engage in pursuit, try to find things

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.14; ssj: 1741; Zhong 1996: 10; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 70;

tls:text.tls:line: To be lax in one's pursuit and let escape the culprit,

sense.def: bandit; villain, thief, thug, malefactor; bandit; guilty person, culprit

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天王使宰咺來歸惠公仲子之賵。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.15; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 11; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 71;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace sent the Administrator Sheuan with presents for the funeral of duke Huey and Jonq Tzyy.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天王使宰咺來歸惠公仲子之賵。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.15; ssj: 1536; Zhong 1996: 11; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 71;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace sent the Administrator Sheuan with presents for the funeral of duke Huey and Jonq Tzyy.

sense.def: His Excellency (applied posthumously to any deceased member of the 諸侯 group) 桓公 Bronze inscriptions have this 公 after deceased persons below 諸侯 rank. [JM]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: A mother has [the name of] her son as family name.

sense.def: son

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: A mother has [the name of] her son as family name.

sense.def: use as a family name (GONG, GU)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: Who was this (p.72) Jonq Tzyy?

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: Who was this (p.72) Jonq Tzyy?

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the rites

sense.def: it is in accordance with ritual that S (possibly should be vt0+S or vt0+V)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: it was permissible to present funeral gifts to a person's mother,

sense.def: give a funeral gift to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man accepted this (information as an entry in the Chuenchiou) on account of the fact that it was rendered in acceptable terminology.

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man accepted this (information as an entry in the Chuenchiou) on account of the fact that it was rendered in acceptable terminology.

sense.def: gentleman 吾先君子

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man accepted this (information as an entry in the Chuenchiou) on account of the fact that it was rendered in acceptable terminology.

sense.def: acceptable; advisable

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man accepted this (information as an entry in the Chuenchiou) on account of the fact that it was rendered in acceptable terminology.

sense.def: rhetorical formulation, proper formulation; diction;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.16; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 12; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The making of this entry is due to the fact

sense.def: record the contextually determinate matter

tls:text.tls:line: What is meant by the term fenq?

sense.def: the giving of funeral gifts

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.17; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: What is meant by the term fenq?

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.17; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: clothing and coverlets are referred to as suey;

sense.def: large, typically double-layered blanket to sleep under; coverlet

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.17; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: clothing and coverlets are referred to as suey;

sense.def: funeral gifts of clothes; give as funeral gift

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.17; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: cowrie shells and jade are referred to as harn;

sense.def: funeral presentation of cowrie shells and jade

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.17; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: money and valuables are referred to as fuh.

sense.def: gift of money and goods to defray expenses with funeral

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.18; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: there was a convenant with a man of Sonq in Suh.

sense.def: the contextually determinate N2 V-s (together) with N1; the contextually determinate N2 V-s against N1

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.18; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: there was a convenant with a man of Sonq in Suh.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.18; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: there was a convenant with a man of Sonq in Suh.

sense.def: swear a formal oath of allegiance (of several subjects)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: Who else participated (in the convenant)?

sense.def: interacting with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: A man of inferior rank of the Interior.

sense.def: from one's own country

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: (The phrase) "a man from Sonq"

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: denotes a man of inferior rank from the Exterior.

sense.def: foreign; of foreign origin; from abroad; not belonging to one's own country

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The day is not given for convenants between men of inferior ranks.

sense.def: formal diplomatic written and ritual agreement, oath of allegiance covenant; pact

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The day is not given for convenants between men of inferior ranks.

sense.def: oath; the swearing of oaths of allegiance

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The day is not given for convenants between men of inferior ranks.

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: occcasionally derived verbal uses in commentarial literature like Gongyang, Guliang: record the day

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.19; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 14; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: is the name of a city.

sense.def: name (of a person or thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.20; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: the earl of Jay came.

sense.def: 秦伯third of the feudal ranks, 公侯伯子男，"earl"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The term lai means

sense.def: come to a contextually determinate place (i.e. the place where the speaker currently is)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: "to come on a court visit".

sense.def: come to a place

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text reject the use of the term chaur ("to pay a court visit")?

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: (The envoy) was a feudal lord enfeoffed (with land) within the Royal Domain

sense.def: royal domain proper

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: (The envoy) was a feudal lord enfeoffed (with land) within the Royal Domain

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: and could therefore not leave (his post) and take part in meetings with other feudal lords

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: without being ordered to do so by the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: should; be permitted to (often negated: 不得，無得)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: without being ordered to do so by the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: take the initiative for a meeting with (another party)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers him at fault for having relations abroad

sense.def: consider as right and proper; consider as ritually correct

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.21; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 15; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: and is therefore not willing to grant the use of the term chaur.

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.22; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 16; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: Bows used on missions of friendly enquiries and the how arrows (a)

sense.def: SHI, ZHOULI: arrow with metal top and feathers used in hunting as well as defensive warfare

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.22; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 16; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: do not travel outside the borders (of the state);

sense.def: boundary

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.22; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 16; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: do not travel outside the borders (of the state);

sense.def: boundary

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.22; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 16; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: When there is one in the most exalted position

sense.def: be noble; be honoured; be deserving of respect or veneration 至尊

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.22; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 16; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: (his subjects) do not match him (c).

sense.def: emulate, match

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.23; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 17; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

sense.def: prince Npr

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.24; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 17; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: To give the day of the death of a great officer

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: record the day for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.24; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 17; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: To give the day of the death of a great officer

sense.def: death

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.01.24; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 17; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: Omission of the day of the death

sense.def: death

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.01; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 17; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke had a meeting with the Rong in Chyan (a).

sense.def: take the initiative for a meeting with (another party)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.01; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 17; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke had a meeting with the Rong in Chyan (a).

sense.def: Róng barbarian; note that all enemies of the Zhōu were currently described as Róng.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The term huey ("to meet")

sense.def: a meeting, assembly

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: indicates that the Exterior (party) acted as host of the meeting.

sense.def: a host, person ritually in charge

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: The one who is wise deliberates,

sense.def: think about the future; make plans

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is righteous (p.73) travels (with his lord),

sense.def: do things; act, behave as a moral agent; perform an act; engage in action

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is benevolent guards (the state in the absence of his ruler) (b).

sense.def: undertake defensive tasks; be in charge of the defence of the state

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: Only when he has (secured himself of the services of) these three (assistants)

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: may (the ruler) go abroad to participate in meetings.

sense.def: go out to have a meeting

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.02; ssj: 1742; Zhong 1996: 18; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 72;

tls:text.tls:line: implies the the duke was in danger.

sense.def: consider as dangerous; consider to be in danger

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.03; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 19; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: men from Jeu entered Shianq.

sense.def: enter and gain possession of (a city) without necessarily permanently occupying it and settling there

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.04; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 19; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: The term ruh ("to enter") implies that

sense.def: attack

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.04; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 19; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: those who are inside (the attacked city) refuse to receive (those who enter).

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.04; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 19; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: those who are inside (the attacked city) refuse to receive (those who enter).

sense.def: welcome;

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.05; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: Wu-shiee led an army and entered Jyi.

sense.def: lead (typically a whole army, or a host of feudal lords etc); hold the command over (areas or districts); ceremonially: lead a cortege of; come first in a procession

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.05; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: Wu-shiee led an army and entered Jyi.

sense.def: the army of the contextually determinate N; army; OBI: military camp, encampment. Troops, armed force, division of the armed forces, regular armed forces; (obsolescent after Qin) HF 1.2: (several hundred thousand) organised armed personnel (should probably be npost-N)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.05; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: Wu-shiee led an army and entered Jyi.

sense.def: enter and gain possession of (a city) without necessarily permanently occupying it and settling there

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.06; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: The term ruh ("to enter") implies

sense.def: attack

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.06; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: that those who are inside (the attacked city) refuse to receive (those who enter).

sense.def: those on the inside; those inside one's clan

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.06; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: that those who are inside (the attacked city) refuse to receive (those who enter).

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.06; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: The one who recklessly sets his mind on entering the territory of others

sense.def: irresponsibly, in an unregimented manner, arbitrarily; irregular THERE IS A MESS-UP WITH THE GRAPHS, READ gǒu:

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.06; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 20; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: (as the ruler of the state of Lu).

sense.def: disapprove of a contextually determinate person; express disapproval

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.07; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 21; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler had a meeting with the Rong in Tarng. [[made a covenant of allegiance, I'm afraid]]

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.07; ssj: 1537; Zhong 1996: 21; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 73;

tls:text.tls:line: the ruler had a meeting with the Rong in Tarng. [[made a covenant of allegiance, I'm afraid]]

sense.def: swear a formal oath of allegiance (of several subjects)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.09; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 21; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: To employ a great officer as an envoy,

sense.def: order a person to do a contextually determinate thing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.09; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 21; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: is due to the fact that he (Lii-shiu) came and had official contacts with us.

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.09; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 21; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: is due to the fact that he (Lii-shiu) came and had official contacts with us.

sense.def: make contact with, interact with, enter into relations with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.10; ssj: 1538; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: the (duke's) eldest daughter went to married (in the state of) Jih.

sense.def: become linked in marriage to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: In the rituals,

sense.def: it is in accordance with ritual that S (possibly should be vt0+S or vt0+V)

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

sense.def: the woman

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: while still at home

sense.def: the woman

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: while still at home

sense.def: one's own home

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: she is governed by her father;

sense.def: be controlled by 制於

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: she is governed by her father;

sense.def: passivising particle: "by" 殺於人 "literally: was killed (the killing) being from/by someone else> be killed by someone else"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: she is governed by her husband;

sense.def: be controlled by 制於

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: she is governed by her husband;

sense.def: passivising particle: "by" 殺於人 "literally: was killed (the killing) being from/by someone else> be killed by someone else"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.11; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: she is governed by her husband;

sense.def: a husband in general;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.12; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 22; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: therefore the Text records it.

sense.def: to record, make a record of; commemorate; write about

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.14; ssj: 1538; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: Tzyy-bor of Jih (?) and the viscount of Jeu jad a meeting in Mih (a).

sense.def: swear blood oath (of allegiance etc.); make a covenant; join a pact; make a treaty

tls:text.tls:srcline:
或曰：
紀子伯、莒子而與之盟，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.15; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: Some say: the viscount of Jih treated the viscount of Jeu as the elder and made a covenant with him.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.15; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: Other say: their ages and rank being the same.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.15; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: Other say: their ages and rank being the same.

sense.def: the contextually determinate N's age; the number of years one lives, the time-span one has lived or will live 盡其天年

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.15; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: Other say: their ages and rank being the same.

sense.def: official high formal rank; appointments to official ranks

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.16; ssj: 1538; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

sense.def: the wife (, by the name of Npr)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.16; ssj: 1538; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke's wife, lady Tzyy, died.

sense.def: of senior officials: die [occasionally also used to refer to the death of an emperor]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.17; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: When a lady dies

sense.def: a wife

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.17; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

sense.def: mention the place; record the location of an event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.17; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: The term furen ("lady")

sense.def: one's wife

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.17; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text records the death but not the burial.

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.02.17; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 23; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 74;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text records the death but not the burial.

sense.def: practice of burying; burial; funeral; the funeral proceedings; the cortège

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.02; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 26; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: In spitting out one ejects what has been removed (a);

sense.def: vomit [what one has in one's stomach], throw up [what one has in one's stomach]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.02; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 26; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: in eating one puts it inside.

sense.def: eat food, eat a meal; have a meal

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.03; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 27; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: Yeou is an implicit expression;

sense.def: word; particle

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.03; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 27; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

sense.def: word; particle

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace died.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.04; ssj: 1538; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace died.

sense.def: Heaven-assigned; by the grace of Heaven; heavenly; divine

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.04; ssj: 1538; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace died.

sense.def: of emperor or king: die

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.05; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: That the term beng is used with reference to the Son of Heaven

sense.def: a Son of Heaven, a certain Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.05; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: is due to his being the most venerable of men.

sense.def: be because of N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.05; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text refer to him as having collapsed?

sense.def: declare to have died

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.05; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: Because he is high above the people

sense.def: superior to N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.05; ssj: 1743; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: the Text refers to his death in this way.

sense.def: declare to have died

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.07; ssj: 1539; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 75;

tls:text.tls:line: (the head of) the Yiin family died.

sense.def: Mr. Mrs.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.08; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: (He was) one of the great officers of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.08; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: Why was an entry made here?

sense.def: declare to have died by using the word zú

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.08; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 29; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

sense.def: declare to have died by using the word zú

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.09; ssj: 1539; Zhong 1996: 31; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: a son of the Wuu family came and requested money contributions.

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.09; ssj: 1539; Zhong 1996: 31; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: a son of the Wuu family came and requested money contributions.

sense.def: gift of money and goods to defray expenses with funeral

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.10; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 31; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: One of the great officers of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.10; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 31; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: Since he was a great officer of the Son of Heaven,

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.10; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 31; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: The mourning had not yet been completed

sense.def: complete; bring to full development

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.10; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 31; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: The mourning had not yet been completed

sense.def: burial; funeral

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.10; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 31; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

sense.def: orphan

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.12; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 32; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 76;

tls:text.tls:line: The term chyou ("to request") is an expression, indicating that the (The basic meaning of qiú)

sense.def: etymological meaning x 之為言y

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.17; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 33; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: The day of the burial is given

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: record the day for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.17; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 33; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: The day of the burial is given

sense.def: practice of burying; burial; funeral; the funeral proceedings; the cortège

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.17; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 33; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to indicate that there were unforeseen and irregular occurrences (b).

sense.def: disastrous altercations; irregular occurrences (SHOULD BE MOVED FROM DISASTER, SURELY. CH)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.03.17; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 33; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: The performance of the burial was indangered.

sense.def: run the danger of; be in danger of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.01; ssj: 1540; Zhong 1996: 34; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: and took Moulou.

sense.def: take possession of (a place); annex a state or city; confiscate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.02; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 35; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: This was the first instance of feudal lords attacking each other

sense.def: OBI: lauch an overt large-scale destructive military campaign against what is construed as an enemy of inferior political status

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.02; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 35; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: and taking cities from each other.

sense.def: take possession of (a place); annex a state or city; confiscate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.02; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 35; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: and taking cities from each other.

sense.def: N then V-ed

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.02; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 35; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: and taking cities from each other.

sense.def: first arise

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.02; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 35; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Text carefully records the event.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.02; ssj: 1744; Zhong 1996: 35; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Text carefully records the event.

sense.def: to record, make a record of; commemorate; write about

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.03; ssj: 1540; Zhong 1996: 35; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 77;

tls:text.tls:line: Jou-shiu of Wei assassinated his lord Wan.

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.04; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 36; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: When a great officer assassinates his lord

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.04; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 36; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: He assassinated his lord in order to replace him (a).

sense.def: replace (someone or something); replace someone in (a place); refill (a place)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.05; ssj: 1540; Zhong 1996: 36; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and the duke of Sonq met at Ching.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.05; ssj: 1540; Zhong 1996: 36; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and the duke of Sonq met at Ching.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together informally as if by chance and hold a meeting, hold an informal meeting

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.06; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 36; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: The term jyi ("and") implies

sense.def: the word 及

tls:text.tls:srcline:
1.4.4宋公、
陳侯、
蔡人、衛人伐鄭。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.07; ssj: 1540; Zhong 1996: 37; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke of Sonq, the marquis of Chern, men from Tsay and men form Wei attacked Jenq.

sense.def: OBI: lauch an overt large-scale destructive military campaign against what is construed as an enemy of inferior political status

tls:text.tls:srcline:
翬帥師會宋公、
陳侯、
蔡人、衛人伐鄭。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.08; ssj: 1540; Zhong 1996: 37; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: Huei led an army, joined the duke of Sonq, the marquis of Chern, men from Tsay and men from Wei and attacked Jenq.

sense.def: join N to V

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 37; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke's son Huei.

sense.def: prince Npr

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 37; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to degrade him.

sense.def: speak of in a negative manner

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 37; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: Why degrade him?

sense.def: speak of in a negative manner

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 37; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: He (later) participated in the assassination of the duke.

sense.def: be complicit with; have connections with; be implicated in; be on good practical terms with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 37; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Texg degrades him.

sense.def: disapprove of a contextually determinate person; express disapproval

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.10; ssj: 1540; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: the people of Wei killed Jou-shiu in Pwu.

sense.def: 不免有殺身之禍have (someone/onself) killed; cause someone/oneself to lose his life, The general word, to be used about animals as well as humans (and occasionally about plants as well), for whatever cause or reason and with whatever means; (sometimes the killed person comes to life again as in ZUO 7.8.1.1)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.11; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: The use of the term ren ("people") as the agent of killing denotes

sense.def: the word 殺

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.11; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: the killing of someone guilty.

sense.def: those who are guilty; the one who is guilty, the culprit

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.11; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to exercize special care.

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.11; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: implies criticism of the fact that the assassin was allowed to escape (abroad) (b).

sense.def: to criticise that (with sentential object)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.12; ssj: 1541; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 78;

tls:text.tls:line: the people of Wei set up Jinn (as their ruler).

sense.def: instate, establish formally in a position (as ruler or official)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.13; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: He had gained the support of the masses.

sense.def: win the trust of; gain the support of; win the allegiance of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.13; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: He had gained the support of the masses.

sense.def: the subject of being many> the crowd, the many people; the mulitudes of the people; the hoi polloi

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.13; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: Since this was so, he must in fact have been worthy.

sense.def: And this (is of the Nab type)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.13; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: Since this was so, he must in fact have been worthy.

sense.def: be

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.13; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: Since this was so, he must in fact have been worthy.

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.13; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: If he was worthy why does the Text state that it was improper to set him up?

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.13; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 38; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: If he was worthy why does the Text state that it was improper to set him up?

sense.def: be obliged to; ought to, should fittingly, have a duty to; deserve to be (VERBED); it is right that; shall

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.14; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 39; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the doctrine of the Chuenchiou

sense.def: underlying meaning of a term; import of a text; message

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.14; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 39; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: the status of feudal lord was granted to the proper heir and not to the (one whose moral qualifications made him more) worthy (in the case of feudal lords it sides with... CH)

sense.def: side with, agree with; give aid to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.14; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 39; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: the status of feudal lord was granted to the proper heir and not to the (one whose moral qualifications made him more) worthy (in the case of feudal lords it sides with... CH)

sense.def: those who are correct, those who behave correctly

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.04.14; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 39; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: the status of feudal lord was granted to the proper heir and not to the (one whose moral qualifications made him more) worthy (in the case of feudal lords it sides with... CH)

sense.def: distinguished person; person of talent and worth (always non-referential?) 尊賢使能

tls:text.tls:line: According to the rites

sense.def: it is in accordance with ritual that S (possibly should be vt0+S or vt0+V)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.02; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 41; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: the (most) venerable (ruler) does not personally attend to petty matters,

sense.def: the noble ones; the honorable ones

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.02; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 41; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: the (most) venerable (ruler) does not personally attend to petty matters,

sense.def: show personal concern for

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.02; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 41; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: For the duke to look at this

sense.def: have a good look at, survey, have a look at and enjoy, visit to have a look at, sound out; poetically: gaze at

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.04; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text gives the month

sense.def: specifiy the month for an event, provide the month for an event (in the annals)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.04; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: on account of the irregular circumstances (of this burial).

sense.def: disastrous altercations; irregular occurrences (SHOULD BE MOVED FROM DISASTER, SURELY. CH)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.05; ssj: 1541; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: an army of Wei entered Shenq.

sense.def: enter and gain possession of (a city) without necessarily permanently occupying it and settling there

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.06; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: The term ruh ("to enter")

sense.def: the word 入

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.06; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: implies that those who are inside (the attacked city) refuse to receive (those who enter).

sense.def: would not; refuse to; decide not to (do what one might otherwise have done); will not; fail to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.06; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: When the commander had mean rank and the troops were numerous the Text refers to the army.

sense.def: general, commander

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.06; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: When the commander had mean rank and the troops were numerous the Text refers to the army.

sense.def: the army of the contextually determinate N; army; OBI: military camp, encampment. Troops, armed force, division of the armed forces, regular armed forces; (obsolescent after Qin) HF 1.2: (several hundred thousand) organised armed personnel (should probably be npost-N)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.06; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:text.tls:line: When the commander had mean rank and the troops were numerous the Text refers to the army.

sense.def: army

sense.def: complete HYDCD 4. 完成；制成。

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.07; ssj: 1541; Zhong 1996: 42; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 79;

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: Kao means

tls:text.tls:line: According to the rites,

sense.def: it is in accordance with ritual that S (possibly should be vt0+S or vt0+V)

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: when a son of a concubine became ruler

sense.def: child by a mother other than one's main wife

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: when a son of a concubine became ruler

sense.def: become (ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: he built a shrine palace for his mother

sense.def: acting for > for something; on someone's behalf; in someone's favour; for the sake of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: he built a shrine palace for his mother

sense.def: build with earth [SHI]; build from scratch, erect

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: he built a shrine palace for his mother

sense.def: palace 宮婦 宮中七市"three markets in the palace compound"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: he built a shrine palace for his mother

sense.def: ancestral temple

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.09; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: and made a prince preside at the offerings there.

sense.def: be the leader of; be in charge of (tasks), take responsibility for; preside over

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.10; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: Yiin was her grandson and yet he repaired (and completed) it.

sense.def: build up and keep in good repair; typically jussive: have built

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.10; ssj: 1745; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers Yiin at fault. (declares...CH)

sense.def: declare wrong> criticise; disagree with, deny; disapprove, be opposed to; oppose

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.11; ssj: 1541; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: For the first time (the duke) presented only six rows of dancers.

sense.def: for the first time

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.11; ssj: 1541; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: For the first time (the duke) presented only six rows of dancers.

sense.def: give N2 to the contextually determiant recipient N1

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.11; ssj: 1541; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: For the first time (the duke) presented only six rows of dancers.

sense.def: row of feathered dancers

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.12; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven employed eight rows of dancers,

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.12; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 43; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: that for the first time the ritual music was usurped (by a feudal lord).

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.13; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 44; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven and the feudal lords alike
