tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.15; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 45; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: This was a calamity occasioned by insects.

sense.def: there was a catapillar pest [Some might prefer to read this as a telegraphically used noun, as when someone writes on a shopping list "milk" and means to suggest "I should remember to buy mild."]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.15; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 45; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: This was a calamity occasioned by insects.

sense.def: caused by insects

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.15; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 45; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: This was a calamity occasioned by insects.

sense.def: OBI 5: disaster (from Heaven/Nature; occasionally self-inflicted as in CC 9.1); the reference is sometimes to a fire

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.15; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 45; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: In severe cases the month is indicated.

sense.def: indicate the month for a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.15; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 45; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 80;

tls:text.tls:line: In less severe cases (only) the season is given.

sense.def: indicate the season for a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.17; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 45; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Gongtzyy Kou died.

sense.def: die (of Duke Wen of Jin, or of prince, sage etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.18; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 45; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: (He) was a great officer (invested by) the late lord (Shiaw).

sense.def: the former ruler; the deceased ruler (can occasionally be used in the plural in ZUO)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.19; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Men from Sonq attacked Jenq

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.19; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and besieged Charngge.

sense.def: besiege (typically a city); lay siege to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.20; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: is not used in conjunction with the phrase fa gwo ("to attack a state").

sense.def: in this place of the text, here in the text

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.20; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: in fighting one does not persue those who flee;

sense.def: pursue; chase; hunt after; hunt for (also abstractly: wisdom); engage in a private hunt of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.20; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: in fighting one does not persue those who flee;

sense.def: those who flee

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.20; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: In punishing one does not obstruct those who have given themselves up (a).

sense.def: mete out punishment

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.20; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: In punishing one does not obstruct those who have given themselves up (a).

sense.def: annihilate, kill off completely HYDCD: 12. 滅絕，參見填4服。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.20; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: In punishing one does not obstruct those who have given themselves up (a).

sense.def: those who are submissive or who surrender

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.21; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: To oppress the people (b)（Wang Niansun conjectures: take captives

sense.def: population; the population at large; human beings, humankind

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.21; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: and to drive away their cattle and horses

sense.def: beat with one's fists; pound; beat and drive off

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.21; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: to destroy trees and demolish houses

sense.def: cut in two; cut down (trees etc) generalised: cut off (a sleeve etc), sever

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.21; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: to destroy trees and demolish houses

sense.def: trees; trees of all kinds

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.21; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: to destroy trees and demolish houses

sense.def: destroy, smash; inflict serious damage on (physical objects), destroy (a state); ruin (the legal system); to do in (a person)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.05.21; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 47; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: to destroy trees and demolish houses

sense.def: buildings; all kinds of buildings, any kind of building

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.01; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 48; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: men form Jenq came and made offer of peace (a).

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.02; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 48; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: The (basic etymological???CH) meaning of pyng

sense.def: the basic technical meaning of X [This probably does not need a separate entry, but we leave it as a reminder that the expression has rather separate possibilities of meaning.]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.02; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 48; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: implies that peace was in fact not achieved.

sense.def: as a fruit> eventually; i n the event, as predicted, as one suspected, really, indeed; as it happened

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.03; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 48; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke had a meeting with the marquis of Chyi

sense.def: take the initiative for a meeting with (another party)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.03; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 48; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: (when they) made a convenant in Ay.

sense.def: swear blood oath (of allegiance etc.); make a covenant; join a pact; make a treaty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.05; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 49; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: men from Sonq took Charngge.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.05; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 49; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: men from Sonq took Charngge.

sense.def: take possession of (a place); annex a state or city; confiscate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.06; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 49; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: The taking of cities of the Exterior was not (normally) recorded.

sense.def: record the contextually determinate matter

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.06; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 49; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text record this instance?

sense.def: in this place of the text, here in the text

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.06.06; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 49; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text record this instance?

sense.def: record the contextually determinate matter

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.01; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 49; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i1;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke's third daughter went to be married to (the ruler of the state of) Jih.

sense.def: become linked in marriage to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.02; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 49; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: The circumstances of meeting a bride are insignificant

sense.def: of slight importance or weight;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.03; ssj: 1542; Zhong 1996: 50; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis of Terng died (a).

sense.def: die (of Duke Wen of Jin, or of prince, sage etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.05; ssj: 1543; Zhong 1996: 50; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: we walled Jongchiou.

sense.def: to build a city wall around (an activity either pursued by those in the city or by an expeditionary military force)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.06; ssj: 17426 Zhong 1996: 50; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: are built for the purpose of protecting the people.

sense.def: defend against enemies and keep secure

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.06; ssj: 17426 Zhong 1996: 50; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: When the population is large and the city is small,

sense.def: be many, be numerous; contain many members; be in the majority 甚眾

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.06; ssj: 17426 Zhong 1996: 50; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: All entries concerning the walling of cities

sense.def: speaking of N in principle, V can be said of it (where V is generally or typically untensed and a non-narrative generic characterisation, often of all members of a group)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.06; ssj: 17426 Zhong 1996: 50; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: All entries concerning the walling of cities

sense.def: the walling of cities

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.06; ssj: 17426 Zhong 1996: 50; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: All entries concerning the walling of cities

sense.def: re'cord

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.07; ssj: 1543; Zhong 1996: 51; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis of Chyi sent his younger brother Nian on a mission of friendly enquiries.

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.07; ssj: 1543; Zhong 1996: 51; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis of Chyi sent his younger brother Nian on a mission of friendly enquiries.

sense.def: visit the contextually determinate person; pay a formal visit to a distinguished contextually determinate person or send a distinguished delegation to such a person

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.08; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 51; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: The nobility of a feudal lord is such

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.08; ssj: 1746; Zhong 1996: 51; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text (therefore) refers to his noble status (of the younger brother of a feudal lord).

sense.def: bring (a subject) up for discussion in a text (See also NAME)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.10; ssj: 1543; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace sent the earl of Farn on a mission of friendly enquiries.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.10; ssj: 1543; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i2;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace sent the earl of Farn on a mission of friendly enquiries.

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.11; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: (He was) a great officer of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.11; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The term fa ("to attack") is used only for states.

sense.def: the word 伐

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.11; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to magnify the appointments of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: consider as important; declare important; admire as very important

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.11; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to magnify the appointments of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.11; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to magnify the appointments of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: royal or imperial order, something that is by the higher order (from somebody)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: on account of the fact that they attacked an envoy of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: be because

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: on account of the fact that they attacked an envoy of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: on account of the fact that they attacked an envoy of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: read shì: employee; envoy

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: was even worse than to seize him.

sense.def: be more intense than N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.07.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 52; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: was even worse than to seize him.

sense.def: arrestation

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.01; ssj: 1543; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke of Sonq and the marquis of Wei met at Chwei.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together informally as if by chance and hold a meeting, hold an informal meeting

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.02; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: To meet without previous appointment is called yuh.

sense.def: agree to V, mostly negated: without previously agreement to V, i.e. as vt(+V1.)+V2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.02; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: To meet without previous appointment is called yuh.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together informally as if by chance and hold a meeting, hold an informal meeting

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.04; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: as a means of degrading the earl of Jenq

sense.def: speak of in a negative manner

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.04; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: and criticizing his giving away land.

sense.def: criticise the act of S; disapprove of Nab

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.04; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: and criticizing his giving away land.

sense.def: give away N to someone

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.06; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text gives the day of entering

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: record the day for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.06; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text gives the day of entering

sense.def: attack

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.06; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to condemn those who entered.

sense.def: criticise the act of S; disapprove of Nab

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.06; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 54; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: where the earl of Jenq had received his appointment from the Son of Heaven

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.07; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Kao-fuu, the marquis of Tsay, died.

sense.def: Npr, the Marqujis of Npl 蔡侯申

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.07; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Kao-fuu, the marquis of Tsay, died.

sense.def: die (of Duke Wen of Jin, or of prince, sage etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.08; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: To give the day of the death of a feudal lord

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: record the day for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.08; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: To give the day of the death of a feudal lord

sense.def: death

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.09; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: the baron of Suh died.

sense.def: baron of 許男

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.10; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: was a small state

sense.def: unimportant, insiginificant

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.10; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: (the ruler of which) had not yet been able to participate in convenants (with Luu).

sense.def: swear blood oath (of allegiance etc.); make a covenant; join a pact; make a treaty

tls:text.tls:srcline:
宋公、
齊侯、衛侯盟于瓦屋。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.11; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 55; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke of Sonq, the marquis of Chyi and the marquis of Wei made a convenant in Waa-u.

sense.def: swear blood oath (of allegiance etc.); make a covenant; join a pact; make a treaty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The day is not (normally) given for convenants between states of the Exterior.

sense.def: record the date (for a preceding object/event)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text give the day here?

sense.def: in this place of the text, here in the text

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text give the day here?

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: occcasionally derived verbal uses in commentarial literature like Gongyang, Guliang: record the day

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The praxis of swearing oaths does not go back to (the time) of the Five Emperors;

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The praxis of swearing oaths does not go back to (the time) of the Five Emperors;

sense.def: oath; the swearing of oaths;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: The praxis of swearing oaths does not go back to (the time) of the Five Emperors;

sense.def: extend to, reach; reach up to the level of; reach out to; reach as far back as to the time of

tls:text.tls:line: the institution of covenants does not go back to (the time of) the Three Kings;

sense.def: extend to, reach; reach up to the level of; reach out to; reach as far back as to the time of

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

sense.def: exchange (hostages etc)

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

sense.def: hostage
