tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.12; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 56; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i3;

tls:text.tls:line: the exchange of hostages does not go back to (the time of) the Two Hegemons (a).

sense.def: extend to, reach; reach up to the level of; reach out to; reach as far back as to the time of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.14; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text gives the month to indicate

sense.def: specifiy the month for an event, provide the month for an event (in the annals)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.14; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: that there were irregular cicumstances.

sense.def: disastrous altercations; irregular occurrences (SHOULD BE MOVED FROM DISASTER, SURELY. CH)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.15; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and a man from Jeu made a covenant at Baulai.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.15; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and a man from Jeu made a covenant at Baulai.

sense.def: swear a formal oath of allegiance (of several subjects)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.16; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: It is permissible to use the phrase "the duke and a man".

sense.def: one may appropriately V

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.16; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: It is impermissible to use the phrase "the duke and a great officer".

sense.def: one may appropriately V

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.16; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: It is impermissible to use the phrase "the duke and a great officer".

sense.def: and [no examples in LY]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.17; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: There were ming insects (a).

sense.def: there was a catapillar pest [Some might prefer to read this as a telegraphically used noun, as when someone writes on a shopping list "milk" and means to suggest "I should remember to buy mild."]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.19; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: why Wu-gai is referred to by his personal name.

sense.def: be told as a reliable truth; hear about (something); have been told about; learn (from an authoritative source) as true; learn about (a battle or war etc., or a doctrine); later, XUN 1: come to hear, simply acoustically, without connotations of understanding and learning; hear that (something either true or false) CHECK ATTRIBUTIONS!

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.19; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Some say (that it was due to the fact) that Yiin did not invest in great officers.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.19; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Others say that it is a case of degradation.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.19; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Others say that it is a case of degradation.

sense.def: by way of explanation

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.19; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Others say that it is a case of degradation.

sense.def: deliberately, insistently, persistently

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.08.19; ssj: 1747; Zhong 1996: 58; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Others say that it is a case of degradation.

sense.def: speak of in a negative manner

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.01; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 59; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace sent Nan Jih to come on a mission of friendly enquiries.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.02; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 59; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: was his style.

sense.def: courtesy name

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.02; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 59; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: (For the Son of Heaven) to send missions of friendly enquiries to a feudal lord

sense.def: 聘於pay a formal visit to a distinguished person or send a distinguished delegation to such a person

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.02; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 59; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: (For the Son of Heaven) to send missions of friendly enquiries to a feudal lord

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.03; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 61; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: with thunder and lightning.

sense.def: there was thunder

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.03; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 61; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: with thunder and lightning.

sense.def: there was thunder and lightning

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.03; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 61; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: with thunder and lightning.

sense.def: there was lightning

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.04; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 61; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Jenn

sense.def: thunder

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.04; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 61; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: is thunder;

sense.def: HF 8.10.33: thunder

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.04; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 61; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: diann

sense.def: OBI 3: HF 8.10.33: lightning

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.04; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 61; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: is lightning.

sense.def: violent thunder; thunderclap

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.05; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 62; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: there was heavy snowfall.

sense.def: it rains (e.g. locusts, snow, also: water)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.05; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 62; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: there was heavy snowfall.

sense.def: snow

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 62; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: there were two occurrences of great unnatural events.

sense.def: twice 再拜

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 62; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: there were two occurrences of great unnatural events.

sense.def: unfortunate unruly turn of events; highly unusual event 心傷國變; HANSHU: 有日蝕地震之變 There were extraordinary events likesolar eclipses and earthquakes.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 62; tr. Malmqvist 1971: i4;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Text exercizes care and records the days of the events.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.08; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 64; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Since Yiin did not invest great officers

sense.def: refuse to V; nonetheless not

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.08; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 64; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Since Yiin did not invest great officers

sense.def: create officials of high rank

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.08; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 64; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Why did Yiin not invest great officers?

sense.def: cause to have high rank> promote to high rank, give high rank to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.09; ssj: 1544; Zhong 1996: 64; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: we walled Lang.

sense.def: to build a city wall around (an activity either pursued by those in the city or by an expeditionary military force)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.11; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 64; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: In order not to neglect (to record) the season.

sense.def: neglect, bypass, leave out; ignore

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.09.13; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: implies that the party of the Exterior (state) acted as host of the meeting.

sense.def: a host, person ritually in charge

tls:text.tls:srcline: 翬帥師會齊人、鄭人伐宋。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.02; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Huei led an army, joined men from Chyi and men from Jenq and attacked Sonq.

sense.def: join N to V

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.03; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke defeated the army of Sonq at Jian.

sense.def: read praads: inflict defeat on

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.03; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke defeated the army of Sonq at Jian.

sense.def: the army of the contextually determinate N; army; OBI: military camp, encampment. Troops, armed force, division of the armed forces, regular armed forces; (obsolescent after Qin) HF 1.2: (several hundred thousand) organised armed personnel (should probably be npost-N)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.04; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text uses the more important term (i.e. bay "to defeat").

sense.def: use as a word; bring up; cite

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.05; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: On the day shin-wey (we) took Gaw.

sense.def: take possession of (a place); annex a state or city; confiscate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.05; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: On the day shin-syh (we) took Farng.

sense.def: take possession of (a place); annex a state or city; confiscate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text does not (normally) give the day in case of the capture of cities.

sense.def: take possession of (a place); annex a state or city; confiscate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text does not (normally) give the day in case of the capture of cities.

sense.def: record the date (for a preceding object/event)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text does not (normally) give the day in case of the capture of cities.

sense.def: give the day for the occurrence of a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text give the day in this instance?

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: occcasionally derived verbal uses in commentarial literature like Gongyang, Guliang: record the day

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text give the day in this instance?

sense.def: give the day for the occurrence of a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Text exercizes care and records the days of the events.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Text exercizes care and records the days of the events.

sense.def: meticulously

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.06; ssj: 1748; Zhong 1996: 65; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 85;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Text exercizes care and records the days of the events.

sense.def: according to GONGYANG commentary SSJZS 2000, vol. 20, p. 30 read rí: record the day for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.07; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 66; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: men from Sonq and men from Wei entered Jenq.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.08; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 66; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: Men from Sonq, men from Tsay and men from Wei attacked Tzay.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.08; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 66; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: The earl of Jenq attacked and captured it.

sense.def: attack and take (a city etc)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不正其因人之力而易取之，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.09; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 66; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers it improper that (the earl of Jenq) relied on the strength of others and thus captured the city with ease.

sense.def: base oneself on (as the the Shang dynasty on the institutions of the Xia), utilise as a basis, utilise as a basis for power; make use of; rely on, take advantage of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不正其因人之力而易取之，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.09; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 66; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers it improper that (the earl of Jenq) relied on the strength of others and thus captured the city with ease.

sense.def: other persons; other people; all the other people

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不正其因人之力而易取之，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.09; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 66; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers it improper that (the earl of Jenq) relied on the strength of others and thus captured the city with ease.

sense.def: with ease, promptly; easily, without special cause; without proper constraint

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.09; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 66; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore (the earl of Jenq) is represented as having been in charge of this matter.

sense.def: be in charge of (things not literally governed); preside over

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.11; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: The term ruh ("to enter") implies

sense.def: the word 入

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.10.11; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: The day of the entering is given

sense.def: attack

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.01; ssj: 1545; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: the marquis of Terng and the marquis of Shiue came on a court visit.

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.02; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: When the Son of Heaven had no (important) matters (to attend to)

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.02; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: When the Son of Heaven had no (important) matters (to attend to)

sense.def: (especially official) matter, especially: public task, official business; public event; public project, (military) undertaking, task; one's professional concern 五事

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.02; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: (the feudal lords) honoured the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: cause to be highly respected; elevate to a respectful position; show respect for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.02; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: (the feudal lords) honoured the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.03; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 67; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: followed the correct norm.

sense.def: indicate the season for a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.06; ssj: 1546; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 86;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke died.

sense.def: of senior officials: die [occasionally also used to refer to the death of an emperor]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: That the Text does not give the place of the duke's death

sense.def: of senior officials: die [occasionally also used to refer to the death of an emperor]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: That the Text does not give the place of the duke's death

sense.def: mention the place; record the location of an event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: and cannot bear to mention the place.

sense.def: bear to V, endure V-ing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: and cannot bear to mention the place.

sense.def: mention the place; record the location of an event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text does not record the burial of an assassinated prince

sense.def: hired murderer; person who was hired as murderer

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text does not record the burial of an assassinated prince

sense.def: be punished, have a punitive expedition carried out against one

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: unless the assassin has been punished.

sense.def: write down, note down; make a record of; record in official capacity; write about

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: unless the assassin has been punished.

sense.def: practice of burying; burial; funeral; the funeral proceedings; the cortège

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Yin 01.11.07; ssj: 1749; Zhong 1996: 68; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 87;

tls:text.tls:line: By this means the subordinates (of the assassinated prince) are represented as guilty.

sense.def: regard as guilty, hold (a person) guilty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.02; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: In order carefully to record the beginning (of duke Hwan's reign).

sense.def: be diligent about, take pains with; devote oneself meticulously to; be meticulous on the point of; be vigilant regarding

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.02; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: In order carefully to record the beginning (of duke Hwan's reign).

sense.def: beginning, the initial state as a dynamic state motivating what happens after that beginning; proper beginning; original cause, Greek: archē;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.03; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: Hwan (who was) the younger brother assassinated his elder brother;

sense.def: as a younger brother; like a younger brother 弟畜之 "nourish like a younger brother would"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.03; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: Hwan (who was) the younger brother assassinated his elder brother;

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.03; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: (Hwan who was a) subject assassinated his lord.

sense.def: as a minister

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.03; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: (Hwan who was a) subject assassinated his lord.

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.03; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven was incapable of settling (this matter),

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.03; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: and the hundred clans were unable to eradicate (the assassin).

sense.def: the people who count; the gentry (i.e. primarily the wellborn people)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.03; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 71; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: through (duke Hwan's) lack (of appreciation) of the Royal Way.

sense.def: eventually; and so in the end, and in the event; and then, thereupon, subsequently; eventually, in the event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.04; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 72; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke succeeded to the title.

sense.def: ascend the throne

tls:text.tls:srcline:
繼故不言即位，
正也。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the correct norm the succession of an assassinated ruler is not indicated by the phrase jyi wey.

sense.def: involve serious ritual irregularities

tls:text.tls:srcline:
繼故不言即位，
正也。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the correct norm the succession of an assassinated ruler is not indicated by the phrase jyi wey.

sense.def: ascend the throne

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

sense.def: involve serious ritual irregularities

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: When the late ruler did not die a natural death

sense.def: the former ruler; the deceased ruler (can occasionally be used in the plural in ZUO)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: When the late ruler did not die a natural death

sense.def: die

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: his son or younger brother could not bear (to perform the ceremony of) succession.

sense.def: offspring, the younger generation; junior members of the family; scion

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: his son or younger brother could not bear (to perform the ceremony of) succession.

sense.def: bear to V, endure V-ing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: his son or younger brother could not bear (to perform the ceremony of) succession.

sense.def: be callous or hard-hearted enough to be able to (live with cruelty by others); be able to bear with cruel behaviour (on one's own part); NB: THE TWO IDENTICAL LEXEMES MUST BE CONFLATED

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.05; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: his son or younger brother could not bear (to perform the ceremony of) succession.

sense.def: ascend the throne

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.06; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: When the phrase jyi wey is used for the succession of an assassinated ruler,

sense.def: involve serious ritual irregularities

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.06; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: this indicates that the successor was an accomplice in the assassination.

sense.def: And this (is of the Nab type)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.06; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: this indicates that the successor was an accomplice in the assassination.

sense.def: be in on as a conspiration

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.06; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

sense.def: be in on as a conspiration

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.06; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: when the late lord did not die a natural death

sense.def: the former ruler; the deceased ruler (can occasionally be used in the plural in ZUO)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.06; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: is to show lack of affection for the late lord.

sense.def: the former ruler; the deceased ruler (can occasionally be used in the plural in ZUO)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.08; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: The earl of Jenq borrewed the fields of Sheu in exchange for a jade bih.

sense.def: borrow

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.08; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 73; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 94;

tls:text.tls:line: The earl of Jenq borrewed the fields of Sheu in exchange for a jade bih.

sense.def: cultivated land, demarcated field, particularly for growing rice or grain; field

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: In the case of borrowing one does not use the term yii ("in exchange for");

sense.def: borrowing things

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: the use of yii indicates that this was not a case of borrowing.

sense.def: borrowing things

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: The unwarranted use of the term jea ("to borrow")

sense.def: borrowing things

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: is a means of concealing that it was a case of exchange of land.

sense.def: avoid and treat as taboo, shy away from mentioning (something); observe a taboo on the subject of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: is a means of concealing that it was a case of exchange of land.

sense.def: exchange by a bartering arrangement, barter

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the rules of propriety,

sense.def: it is in accordance with ritual that S (possibly should be vt0+S or vt0+V)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: when the Son of Heaven occupied his exalted position,

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.09; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: feudal lords were not in position to give land to each other.

sense.def: object marker: 把(這個東西) also: 以。。。而。。。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.10; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: From this passage it is evident that (the state of) Luu no longer paid court visits to Jou

sense.def: therefore, thus

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.10; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 74; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: From this passage it is evident that (the state of) Luu no longer paid court visits to Jou

sense.def: understand that S

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.11; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and the earl of Jenq made a covenant at Yueh.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.11; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and the earl of Jenq made a covenant at Yueh.

sense.def: swear a formal oath of allegiance (of several subjects)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.12; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: The term jyi ("and") indicates

sense.def: the word 及 "and"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.12; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: that the Interior party took initiative to the meeting.

sense.def: aspiration for N; initiative for; concern for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.13; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: there were great floods.

sense.def: in a big way; very much, mightily, highly, greatly; on a large scale

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.13; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: there were great floods.

sense.def: there is a flood

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.14; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: When highlying as well as lowlying (areas) suffer from floods one calls it dah shoei ("great floods").

sense.def: flood

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.14; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 75; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: When highlying as well as lowlying (areas) suffer from floods one calls it dah shoei ("great floods").

sense.def: OBI 5: disaster (from Heaven/Nature; occasionally self-inflicted as in CC 9.1); the reference is sometimes to a fire

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.16; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: only a complete cycle of four seasons constitutes a full year.

sense.def: season; periods of time as defined by the official calendar

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.16; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: only a complete cycle of four seasons constitutes a full year.

sense.def: be completely present, without any element missing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.01.16; ssj: 1750; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: only a complete cycle of four seasons constitutes a full year.

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.01; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

tls:text.tls:line: Du of Sonq assassinated his lord Yeu-yi and his great officer Koong-fuu.

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.01; ssj: 1547; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 95;

sense.def: and [no examples in LY]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.04; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: Since Koong-fuu died before (the duke),

sense.def: as the first, first

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.04; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: How did (it happen that) Koong-fuu died before (the duke)?

sense.def: as the first, first

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.04; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereupon he first killed Koong-fuu.

sense.def: and thus

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.04; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 76; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereupon he first killed Koong-fuu.

sense.def: as the first, first

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.05; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 77; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: How to we know (form the wording of the Chuenchiou) that he first killed Koong-fuu?

sense.def: as the first, first

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.05; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 77; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: the father cannot bear to refer to him by his personal name;

sense.def: bear to V, endure V-ing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.05; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 77; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: the father cannot bear to refer to him by his personal name;

sense.def: speak of; mention

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.05; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 77; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereby may we know that the ruler followed him (in death) (b).

sense.def: conj: on the basis of this (subjective) judgment or subjectively appreciated reason; by this method

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.05; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 77; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereby may we know that the ruler followed him (in death) (b).

sense.def: this (particular abstract thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.05; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 77; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: used as a posthumous title.

sense.def: posthumous name

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.06; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 79; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: Master Koong treated Sonq as the state of his ancestors.

sense.def: treat as one's ancestral home

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.07; ssj: 1548; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: The vicount of Terng came and paid a court visit.

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.08; ssj: 1548; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to settle the confusion in Sonq.

sense.def: intending thereby to, in order to; in order to; so that one can

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.08; ssj: 1548; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to settle the confusion in Sonq.

sense.def: bring to a peaceful conclusion or settlement (a rebellion etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.08; ssj: 1548; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to settle the confusion in Sonq.

sense.def: something chaotic; a chaotic state; a chaotic situation, political chaos

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.09; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: The term yii ("in order to") indicates

sense.def: the word 以 "in order to"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.09; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke took the initiative with regard to the settling of the confusion.

sense.def: bring to a peaceful conclusion or settlement (a rebellion etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.09; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke took the initiative with regard to the settling of the confusion.

sense.def: this (abstract) N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.09; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: 80; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: And yet the superior man has made no omissions (in his description of duke Hwan's behaviour).

sense.def: gentleman 吾先君子

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.10; ssj: 1548; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) took the great tripod of Gaw from Sonq.

sense.def: get N1 from N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.10; ssj: 1548; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 96;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) took the great tripod of Gaw from Sonq.

sense.def: dǐng tripod

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.11; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: In the Interior Hwan assassinated his lord.

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.11; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: and withdrew having received a bribe.

sense.def: bribe 受賂

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.11; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: With (this bribe, the tripod of Gaw,) he served his ancestors.

sense.def: intending thereby to, in order to; in order to; so that one can

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.11; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: With (this bribe, the tripod of Gaw,) he served his ancestors.

sense.def: ZUO Zhao 22: original first ancestor of the clan; the highest ancestor (BUDDH: patriarch (the founder or transmitter of a Buddhist lineage))

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.12; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: (indicating that duke Hwan) took it from Sonq.

sense.def: take N2 from N1; take N1 from N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.12; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers this tripod (a bribe received upon the) punishment (of Sonq) (f).

sense.def: this (particular concrete thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.12; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i1; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: (Int the designation of) objects one follows the (praxis of) the central states."

sense.def: central states (sometimes, but not always excluding states like Chu and Qin)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.14; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: (For) court visits (the Chuenchiou normally) records the season.

sense.def: indicate the season for a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.14; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text indicate the month here?

sense.def: indicate the month for a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.14; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: In the Interior (duke) Hwan assassinated his lord.

sense.def: assassinate (a superior), whether one's ruler, parent, or elder sibling. Sometimes incirectly through a hired assassin

tls:text.tls:srcline:
於是為齊侯、
陳侯、鄭伯計

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.14; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: Iu shyh wei Chyi hour, Chern hour, Jenq bor tao

sense.def: be punished, have a punitive expedition carried out against one

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.14; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: (The marquis of) Jih made an approach with regard to this matter and paid a court visit to him.

sense.def: this (abstract) N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.14; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) condemns him,

sense.def: criticise the act of S; disapprove of Nab

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.15; ssj: 1548; Zhong 1996: i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis of Tsay and the earl of Jenq had a meeting in Denq.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together in a meeting; hold a meeting

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.16; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: (we) entered Chii.

sense.def: enter and gain possession of (a city) without necessarily permanently occupying it and settling there

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.17; ssj: 1751; Zhong 1996: i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: We entered it.

sense.def: enter and gain possession of (a city) without necessarily permanently occupying it and settling there

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.18; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke and the Rong made a covenant in Tarng.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.18; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke and the Rong made a covenant in Tarng.

sense.def: swear a formal oath of allegiance (of several subjects)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.18; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke and the Rong made a covenant in Tarng.

sense.def: X and Y entered a formal contract by swearing an oath

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.02.19; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 97;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke arrived from Tarng.

sense.def: OBI 4: from 出自湯谷

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.02; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: i4; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: the marquis of Chyi and the marquis of Wei pledged each other in Pwu.

sense.def: mutually, one another

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.03; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: i4; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: The expression shiu is equivalent to shiang ("mutual").

sense.def: the word 胥 "mutually"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.03; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: i4; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: (They) made cautious speeches and withdrew (a).

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.03; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: i4; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers this (praxis) to be near to (the praxis of) the old (times).

sense.def: this (particular abstract thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.07; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: 85; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: Gong-tzyy Huei went to Chyi to meet the bride (of duke Hwan).

sense.def: go to N in order to V

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.07; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: 85; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: Gong-tzyy Huei went to Chyi to meet the bride (of duke Hwan).

sense.def: welcome; go out to welcome (a bride etc); go out to meet as a gesture of politeness or submission

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.09; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: 85; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: the marquis of Chyi escorted (his daughter) lady Jinag to Huan.

sense.def: send off/accompany N1 to the place N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the rites, when escorting a daughter

sense.def: accompany some way upon departure

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the rites, when escorting a daughter

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: the father does not descend from the hall,

sense.def: descend from

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: and the elder and younger brothers do not go beyond the gate towers.

sense.def: gate tower; lookout tower by the gate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: The father admonishes her, saying:

sense.def: admonish someone and say:...

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: "Take great care to follow your maternal uncles instructions!"

sense.def: be properly diligent

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: "Take great care to follow your maternal uncles instructions!"

sense.def: obey (orders) (not normally persons)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: "Take great care to follow your maternal aunts` instructions!"

sense.def: be properly diligent

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.10; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: "Take great care to follow your maternal aunts` instructions!"

sense.def: obey (orders) (not normally persons)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.11; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 98;

tls:text.tls:line: To escort a daughter across the border

sense.def: daughter

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.14; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: 86; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: The spouse, kady Jiang, arrived from Chyi.

sense.def: OBI 4: from 出自湯谷

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.15; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 87; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: "To dress in a cerimonial cap and to meet the bride in person,

sense.def: wear an official hat

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.15; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 87; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: "To dress in a cerimonial cap and to meet the bride in person,

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.15; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 87; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: is that not to consider (the occasion) too important?"

sense.def: excessively

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.17; ssj: 1549; Zhong 1996: 88; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: There was a (good) year.

sense.def: OBI 4: in OBI: good harvest; Warring States: yearly harvest (good or bad) 豐年 "bumper harvest"; 2. year with good harvest

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.18; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 88; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: When the five grains all ripen

sense.def: cereal; salary in cereal 榖不可勝食

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.03.18; ssj: 1752; Zhong 1996: 88; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: When the five grains all ripen

sense.def: to mature; to ripen

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.01; ssj: 1550; Zhong 1996: 89; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke hunted in Lang.

sense.def: conduct a hunt, sometimes specifically winter hunt; occasionally in ZUO spring time hunt

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 90; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: was performed for the sake of the offerings in the ancestral temple.

sense.def: ancestral

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 90; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: was performed for the sake of the offerings in the ancestral temple.

sense.def: ancestral temples, temples for the ancestors (symbols of the nation, see this word under NATION)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 90; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: In Spring it was called tyan,

sense.def: go on an official hunt, sometimes specifically the spring hunt

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 90; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: in Summer it was called miau,

sense.def: to hunt in springtime (GONG); to hunt in summer (SHI; GU; ZUO)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 90; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: in Autumn it was called sou,

sense.def: conduct a military review (what is the exact nature of this? so far unclear)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 90; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: and in Winter it was called show.

sense.def: conduct a hunt, sometimes specifically winter hunt; occasionally in ZUO spring time hunt

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.03; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 91; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: secondly, to provide for the guests,

sense.def: official guests of all kinds, guests of any kind

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.03; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 91; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: and, thirdly, to provide for the kitchen of the lord (a)

sense.def: fill to satisfaction (as the stomach or a granary); fill up to the brim, be all over (a place); satisfy (one's hunger)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.03; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 91; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: and, thirdly, to provide for the kitchen of the lord (a)

sense.def: kitchen

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.04.04; ssj: 1550; Zhong 1996: 91; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 99;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace sent the administrator Chyu Bor-jeou on a mission of friendly enquiries.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.01; ssj: 1550; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: Baw, marquis of Chern, died.

sense.def: Npr, the Marqujis of Npl 蔡侯申

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the dogma of the Chuenchiou

sense.def: underlying meaning of a term; import of a text; message

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: certainties are transmitted as certainties

sense.def: that which is certain

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.02; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: and doubts as doubts.

sense.def: doubtful matters

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故微其君臣，而著其父子，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.05; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore (the Chuenchiou uses a terminology which) places less stress on the relation between ruler and subject (i.e. the relation between the king and his envoy) (while it at the same time) stresses the relation between father and son.

sense.def: treat as unimportant, deemphasise

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故微其君臣，而著其父子，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.05; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore (the Chuenchiou uses a terminology which) places less stress on the relation between ruler and subject (i.e. the relation between the king and his envoy) (while it at the same time) stresses the relation between father and son.

sense.def: relationship between ruler and subject

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故微其君臣，而著其父子，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.05; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore (the Chuenchiou uses a terminology which) places less stress on the relation between ruler and subject (i.e. the relation between the king and his envoy) (while it at the same time) stresses the relation between father and son.

sense.def: treat as important; emphasise

tls:text.tls:srcline: 不正父在子代仕之辭也。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.05; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 92; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: (This is) an expression indicating that (the Chuenchiou) considers it incorrect for the son to act for his father while the father is alive.

sense.def: take someone else's place 四時相代

tls:text.tls:srcline:
蔡人、
衛人、陳人從王伐鄭。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.08; ssj: 1551; Zhong 1996: 93; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: men from Tsay, men from Wei and men from Chern followed the King and attacked Jenq.

sense.def: to V, obeying V

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.09; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 93; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou wishes to) conceal (the fact) that the King by Heaven's Grace attacked Jenq.

sense.def: be because

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.09; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 93; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou wishes to) conceal (the fact) that the King by Heaven's Grace attacked Jenq.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.09; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 93; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: That Jenq in these circumstances did not submit (to the King)

sense.def: under such circumstances

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.09; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 93; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: was a source of embarrassment for the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.09; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 93; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 100;

tls:text.tls:line: was a source of embarrassment for the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: state of distress; trouble

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.10; ssj: 1551; Zhong 1996: 95; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: There was a grand sacrifice for rain.

sense.def: sacrifice as part of prayer for rain

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.11; ssj: 1551; Zhong 1996: 95; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: There were locusts.

sense.def: there was a locust plague

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.12; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 95; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: refers to a plague of locusts.

sense.def: caused by insects

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.12; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 95; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: In serious cases the Text gives the month;

sense.def: indicate the month for a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.12; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 95; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: In less serious cases the Text gives the season.

sense.def: indicate the season for a contextually determinate event

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.13; ssj: 1551; Zhong 1996: 95; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke of Jou went to Tsaur.

sense.def: 州公 Duke is not here an enfeoffment title of the Zhōu, but presumably of the Shāng (See 日知錄 p. 566)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.14; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: Why was this entry made here?

sense.def: write a contextually determinate document or text N; write (the same thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.14; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: (The duke of Jou) passed through our state.

sense.def: guo1: cross over (a river, a bridge); transgress (a territory); pass through; pass by (a place or a person) PRONOUNCIATION!

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.14; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: (The duke of Jou) passed through our state.

sense.def: my/our [territory]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.05.14; ssj: 1753; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: (The duke of Jou) passed through our state.

sense.def: our territory; our state; my state

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.01; ssj: 1551; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: that (same person) came.

sense.def: this same item

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.02; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: The term shyh lai

sense.def: this same item

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.02; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: To whom does the phrase shyh lai refer?

sense.def: very rarely: whom

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.02; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: It refers to the duke of Jou.

sense.def: 州公 Duke is not here an enfeoffment title of the Zhōu, but presumably of the Shāng (See 日知錄 p. 566)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.02; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 96; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Text refers to him in this brief form.

sense.def: neglecting detail: concisely, briefly

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.04; ssj: 1551; Zhong 1996: 97; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: there was a grand military review.

sense.def: to hold a (military) review

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.05; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 97; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: (The duke) inspected the weapons and the chariots.

sense.def: inspect, survey, SHU: investigate; to inspect exhaustively and in detail, one by one. Applied to reading, to read attentively, without missing a single character

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.05; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 97; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore it exercises care and records the day.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.05; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 97; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 101;

tls:text.tls:line: Gay yii guann furen yee (a).

sense.def: a visit, an inspection

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.07; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 98; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 102;

sense.def: like an ordinary man; appropriate to an ordinary man

sense.def: ordinary and vulgar (action)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.07; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 98; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 102;

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis of Chern was fond of hunting

sense.def: delight in VERBing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.07; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 98; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 102;

tls:text.tls:line: and (once) went to certain excesses when hunting in Tsay.

sense.def: in an untrammelled way, freely; to one's heart's content

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.07; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 98; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 102;

tls:text.tls:line: and (once) went to certain excesses when hunting in Tsay.

sense.def: hunt (as a professional hunter); go on a hunt, hunt as a pleasure excursion

tls:text.tls:srcline: 蔡人不知其是陳君也，而殺之。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.08; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 98; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 102;

sense.def: be

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.06.10; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 99; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 102;

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.07.02; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 100; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 102;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to ciriticize (the fact that the duke) attacked with fire (b).

sense.def: be critical of S

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.01; ssj: 1552; Zhong 1996: 103; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 103;

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.02; ssj: 1754; Zhong 1996: 103; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 103;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.03; ssj: 1553; Zhong 1996: 104; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 103;

tls:text.tls:line: The King by Heaven's Grace sent Jia-fuu on a mission of friendly enquiries.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.04; ssj: 1553; Zhong 1996: 105; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 103;

tls:text.tls:line: there was the Winter sacrifice.

sense.def: perform the summer sacrifice in which one offers steamed rice to the ancestors

tls:text.tls:line: The jeng sacrifice

sense.def: name of a summer sacrifice in which one offers steamed rice to the ancestors

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.07; ssj: 1553; Zhong 1996: 105; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 103;

sense.def: it rains (e.g. locusts, snow, also: water)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.07; ssj: 1553; Zhong 1996: 105; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 103;

tls:text.tls:line: there was snow.

sense.def: snow

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.09; ssj: 1755; Zhong 1996: 106; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 104;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) considers as incorrect the fact that in a great matter pertaining to the ancestral temple

sense.def: ancestral

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.09; ssj: 1755; Zhong 1996: 106; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 104;

tls:text.tls:line: is an expression denoting the continuation of an event.

sense.def: word; particle

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.08.10; ssj: 1755; Zhong 1996: 106; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 104;

tls:text.tls:line: "For the Son of Heaven there is no Exterior

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.09.01; ssj: 1553; Zhong 1996: 108; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 104;

tls:text.tls:line: (lady) Jiang, fourth daughter of (the marquis of) Jih went to the capital.

sense.def: capital

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.09.05; ssj: 1553; Zhong 1996: 108; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 104;

tls:text.tls:line: the earl of Tsaur sent his heir Yih-gu to come and pay a court visit.

sense.def: the heir Npr

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使世子伉諸侯之禮而來朝，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.09.07; ssj: 1755; Zhong 1996: 108; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 105;

tls:text.tls:line: The earl of Tsaur deviated from the correct (principles) when he made his heir participate in rites proper to a feudal lord and under these circumstances made him pay a court visit (to Luu).

sense.def: offend against, go against (e.g. ritual etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.09.07; ssj: 1755; Zhong 1996: 108; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 105;

sense.def: And this (is of the Nab type)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.10.04; ssj: 1554; Zhong 1996: 110; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 105;

tls:text.tls:line: (He) refused to meet (him).

sense.def: go to meet (someone) in person 弗遇

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.10.05; ssj: 1755; Zhong 1996: 110; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 105;

tls:text.tls:line: The phrase "refused to meet" indicates

sense.def: go to meet (someone) in person 弗遇

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.10.07; ssj: 1755; Zhong 1996: 110; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 105;

tls:text.tls:line: refers to a battle which has been previously agreed upon.

sense.def: decided upon

tls:text.tls:srcline:
齊人、
衛人、鄭人盟于惡曹。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.11.01; ssj: 1554; Zhong 1996: 111; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 105;

tls:text.tls:line: a man of Chyi, a man of Wei and a man of Jenq made a covenant in Ehtsaur.

sense.def: swear blood oath (of allegiance etc.); make a covenant; join a pact; make a treaty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.11.02; ssj: 1554; Zhong 1996: 111; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 105;

tls:text.tls:line: Wuh-sheng, earl of Jenq died.

sense.def: 秦伯罃

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.11.04; ssj: 1554; Zhong 1996: 111; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 106;

tls:text.tls:line: the people of Sonq seized Jay-jonq of Jenq.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.11.05; ssj: 1756; Zhong 1996: 111; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 106;

tls:text.tls:line: The term Sonq ren

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.11.05; ssj: 1756; Zhong 1996: 111; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 106;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text use the term ren ("man")?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.11.08; ssj: 1555; Zhong 1996: 112; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 106;

tls:text.tls:line: Hu of Jenq left (his state) and fled to Wei.

sense.def: leave so as to flee to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.11.10; ssj: 1555; Zhong 1996: 112; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 107;

tls:text.tls:line: Rou had a meeting with the duke of Sonq, the marquis of Chern and the third brother of (the marquis of) Tsay in Jer.

sense.def: swear blood oath (of allegiance etc.); make a covenant; join a pact; make a treaty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.12.09; ssj: 1756; Zhong 1996: 114; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 107;

tls:text.tls:line: The Text repeats the day (biing-shiu)

sense.def: a second time; for the second time 再取 "marry again" 再。。。再 "over and over again..."

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.12.10; ssj: 1556; Zhong 1996: 115; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 107;

sense.def: jointly with, in cooperation with

tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.12.11; ssj: 1756; Zhong 1996: 115; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 107;

tls:text.tls:line: that (the Chuenchiou) considers their lack of harmony shameful.

sense.def: consider it disgraceful that S

tls:text.tls:srcline:
及齊侯、
宋公、
衛侯、燕人戰，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.13.01; ssj: 1556; Zhong 1996: 115; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 108;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) fought with the marquis of Chyi, the duke of Sonq, the marquis of Wei and men from Ian.

sense.def: engage in V together with, or in alliance with all the persons in N1

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.14.05; ssj: 1757; Zhong 1996: 118; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 108;

tls:text.tls:line: The nobility of the feudal lord is such

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.14.06; ssj: 1757; Zhong 1996: 118; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 108;

tls:text.tls:line: The one who looks into (p.109) the distance

sense.def: look out for; look at (admiringly) from afar; look to (for guidance); look into the distance (as from a tower etc); see from a distance; look around; look into distance in expectation of somebody's arrival

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.14.06; ssj: 1757; Zhong 1996: 118; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 108;

tls:text.tls:line: The one who looks into (p.109) the distance

sense.def: what is distant, a distant place

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.14.09; ssj: 1757; Zhong 1996: 119; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 109;

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven ploughs in person

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.14.09; ssj: 1757; Zhong 1996: 119; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 109;

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven ploughs in person

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.14.09; ssj: 1757; Zhong 1996: 119; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 109;

tls:text.tls:line: The Queen cares personally for the silkworms

sense.def: personally, in person

tls:text.tls:srcline:
2.14.6宋人以齊人、
蔡人、
衛人、陳人伐鄭。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.14.13; ssj: 1557; Zhong 1996: 121; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 109;

tls:text.tls:line: Men from Sonq, with men from Chyi, men from Wei, men from Tsay and men from Chern attacked Jenq.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.01; ssj: 1557; Zhong 1996: 122; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 110;

tls:text.tls:line: the King by Heaven's Grace sent Jia-fuu to come and ask for carriages.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.02; ssj: 1758; Zhong 1996: 122; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 110;

tls:text.tls:line: In times of old the feudal lords at (fixed) times

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.02; ssj: 1758; Zhong 1996: 122; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 110;

tls:text.tls:line: but there were no summons or requests.

sense.def: summons

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.02; ssj: 1758; Zhong 1996: 122; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 110;

tls:text.tls:line: was even more improper.

sense.def: carry things far, go beyond the normal 已甚者"one who carries things too far"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.03; ssj: 1558; Zhong 1996: 122; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 110;

tls:text.tls:line: the King of Heaven's Grace died.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.05; ssj: 1558; Zhong 1996: 122; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 110;

tls:text.tls:line: Tuh, earl of Jenq, left (his state) and fled to Tsay.

sense.def: 秦伯罃

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.05; ssj: 1558; Zhong 1996: 122; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 110;

tls:text.tls:line: Tuh, earl of Jenq, left (his state) and fled to Tsay.

sense.def: leave so as to flee to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.15.13; ssj: 1558; Zhong 1996: 124; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 111;

tls:text.tls:line: Tuh, the earl of Jenq, entered into Lih.

sense.def: 秦伯罃

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.16.03; ssj: 1559; Zhong 1996: 125; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 111;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke returned from the attack of Jenq.

sense.def: from 至自伐鄭

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.16.06; ssj: 1559; Zhong 1996: 126; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 111;

tls:text.tls:line: Shuoh, marquis of Wei, left (his state) and fled to Chyi.

sense.def: leave so as to flee to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.16.07; ssj: 1759; Zhong 1996: 126; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 111;

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven summoned him and he did not go forward.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.16.07; ssj: 1759; Zhong 1996: 126; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 111;

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven summoned him and he did not go forward.

sense.def: call the contextually determinate person in

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.16.07; ssj: 1759; Zhong 1996: 126; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 111;

tls:text.tls:line: The Son of Heaven summoned him and he did not go forward.

sense.def: go to the contextually determinate place (often answering a summoning by a superior)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.17.02; ssj: 1559; Zhong 1996: 126; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 111;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and Yi-fuu of Juliuh made a covenant at Tsoei.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.17.03; ssj: 1559; Zhong 1996: 126; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 112;

tls:text.tls:line: (the army of Luu) and the army of Chyi fought at Shi.

sense.def: with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.17.06; ssj: 1560; Zhong 1996: 127; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 112;

tls:text.tls:line: the fourth brother of (the marquis of) Tsay returned from Chern to Tsay.

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.17.06; ssj: 1560; Zhong 1996: 127; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 112;

tls:text.tls:line: the fourth brother of (the marquis of) Tsay returned from Chern to Tsay.

sense.def: return to 歸于 (where the subject belongs)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.17.08; ssj: 1560; Zhong 1996: 127; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 112;

tls:text.tls:line: there was the burial of duke Hwan of Tsay.

sense.def: Marquis Npr of Npl 蔡桓侯

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.18.02; ssj: 1759; Zhong 1996: 129; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 112;

tls:text.tls:line: On account of the proud disposition of the spouse (a).

sense.def: offensively arrogant disposition

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.18.05; ssj: 1560; Zhong 1996: 130; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 112;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke's funeral procession arrived from Chyi.

sense.def: OBI 4: from 出自湯谷

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.18.08; ssj: 1759-1760; Zhong 1996: 130; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 113;

tls:text.tls:line: is not recorded unless the assassin has been punished.

sense.def: hired murderer; person who was hired as murderer

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.18.08; ssj: 1759-1760; Zhong 1996: 130; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 113;

tls:text.tls:line: is not recorded unless the assassin has been punished.

sense.def: be punished, have a punitive expedition carried out against one

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.18.09; ssj: 1760; Zhong 1996: 130; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 113;

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is benevolent guards (the state in the absence of the ruler).

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Huan 02.18.09; ssj: 1760; Zhong 1996: 130; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 113;

tls:text.tls:line: Only when he has (secured himself of the services of) these three (assistants)

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.02; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 133; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 117;

tls:text.tls:line: if the late ruler did not die a natural death,

sense.def: the former ruler; the deceased ruler (can occasionally be used in the plural in ZUO)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.02; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 133; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 117;

tls:text.tls:line: then the son did not bear (to perform the ceremony of) succession.

sense.def: bear to V, endure V-ing

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.04; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 134; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 117;

tls:text.tls:line: The term suen ("grandson") is here used for suenn ("to withdraw") (or perhaps: 遜 "obey CH??)

sense.def: etymological meaning x 之為言y

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.04; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 134; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 117;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to conceal (that the mother of duke Juang) fled.

sense.def: flight

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.04; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 134; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 117;

tls:text.tls:line: Men's relation to Heaven is as follows:

sense.def: x之於y(也) "As for X's relation to Y,...

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
