tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.08; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 140; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 118;

tls:text.tls:line: the prince himself (i.e. duke Hwan) (a) had been assassinated in Chyi.

sense.def: the N him/herself??? 躬君 "the ruler himself" [extraordinary!???]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.08; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 140; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 118;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Son of Heaven had) ordered him (i.e. the son and successor of the assassinated ruler) to act as host (at the marriage ceremony)

sense.def: marriage SHI; relationships by marriage

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.10; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 141; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 118;

tls:text.tls:line: must appear from the southern gate of the palace.

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.10; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 141; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 118;

tls:text.tls:line: must appear from the southern gate of the palace.

sense.def: public (benefit, road, law etc), belonging to the public rather than to any private individual

tls:text.tls:srcline: 仇讎之人、非所以接婚姻也，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.11; ssj: 1761; Zhong 1996: 141; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 118;

tls:text.tls:line: (b) Men involved in a feud (with the bridegroom) do not participate in his marriage ceremony.

sense.def: who are mortal enemies

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.16; ssj: 1762; Zhong 1996: 143; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 119;

tls:text.tls:line: who has not received (these) distinctions in his life-time

sense.def: going after the dead> posthumously; retrospectively 追錫之

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.16; ssj: 1762; Zhong 1996: 143; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 119;

tls:text.tls:line: is extremely incorrect.

sense.def: be straight and not warped, behave correctly; be objectively 不正甚

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.19; ssj: 1562; Zhong 1996: 144; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 119;

tls:text.tls:line: An army of Chyi shifted (the population of the cities) Pyng, Tzy, and Wu of (the state of) Jih (a).

sense.def: transfer, move about to new duties

tls:text.tls:srcline:
或曰：
遷紀于郱、鄑、郚。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.01.20; ssj: 1762; Zhong 1996: 144; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 119;

tls:text.tls:line: Some say that (the army of Chyi) shifted (the population of) Jih to Pyng-tzy-wu.

sense.def: move (something or somebody N1) to ( a place N2); relocate N1 to the place N2 遷紀于郱、鄑、郚

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.03.02; ssj: 1762; Zhong 1996: 146; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 120;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) condemns him for having a meeting with the enemy and for having attacked (a state whose ruler had) the same clan name (as Luu).

sense.def: mortal enemy; mortal enemies

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.03.06; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 147; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 120;

tls:text.tls:line: "it was a second burial.

sense.def: by way of making a change

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.03.06; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 147; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 120;

tls:text.tls:line: According to the ritual of the second burial (the mourners wear) the sy dress of coarse cloth (which is the lowest of the give grades of mourning clothes).

sense.def: by way of making a change

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.03.07; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 148; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 120;

tls:text.tls:line: That the Text records the death but not the burial (of the Son of Heaven)

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.03.10; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 149; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 120;

tls:text.tls:line: Those in superior postition choose an appellation proper to their status.

sense.def: name

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.03.10; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 149; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 120;

tls:text.tls:line: signifies that it is towards him that the people (wanq=) come forward.

sense.def: (DCD is inconsistent and readss ub verbo 往2: guīwàng). rally to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.03.10; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 149; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 120;

tls:text.tls:line: signifies that it is towards him that the people (wanq=) come forward.

sense.def: OBI: set out for; be on one's way; go along to; go to GUAN: 往之, 所往

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.04.02; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 151; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 121;

tls:text.tls:line: whereby (the Chuenchiou) criticizes the marquis of Chyi.

sense.def: find fault with

tls:text.tls:srcline:
齊侯、
陳侯、鄭伯遇于垂。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.04.05; ssj: 1563; Zhong 1996: 152; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 121;

tls:text.tls:line: the marquis of Chyi, the marquis of Chern and the earl of Jenq met at Chwei.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together informally as if by chance and hold a meeting, hold an informal meeting

tls:text.tls:srcline: 言民之從者四年而後畢也。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.04.07; ssj: 1763; Zhong 1996: 152; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 122;

tls:text.tls:line: It is said that the exodus of the people was completed after four years.

sense.def: be completed, be completely achieved; be completely understood; reach perfection

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.04.11; ssj: 1564; Zhong 1996: 153; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 123;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and a man from Chyi hunted in Haw.

sense.def: together with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.04.11; ssj: 1564; Zhong 1996: 153; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 123;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and a man from Chyi hunted in Haw.

sense.def: conduct a hunt, sometimes specifically winter hunt; occasionally in ZUO spring time hunt

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.04.12; ssj: 1764; Zhong 1996: 153; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 123;

tls:text.tls:line: Why is he referred to as "a man"?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.04.12; ssj: 1764; Zhong 1996: 153; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 123;

tls:text.tls:line: One's resentment is not released

sense.def: unfriendly act

tls:text.tls:srcline:
公會齊人、
宋人、
陳人、蔡人伐衛。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.05.06; ssj: 1565; Zhong 1996: 155; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 124;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke joinded men from Chyi, men from Sonq, men form Chern and men from Tsay and attacked Wei.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.05.07; ssj: 1764; Zhong 1996: 155; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 124;

tls:text.tls:line: These (men were) the marquis of Chyi and the duke of Sonq.

sense.def: this (particular concrete thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.05.07; ssj: 1764; Zhong 1996: 155; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 124;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text refer to them as "men"?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.06.04; ssj: 1764; Zhong 1996: 156; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 124;

tls:text.tls:line: (The feudal lords must) not act contrary to the command of the King by Heaven's Grace.

sense.def: oppose, go against; disobey (orders)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.06.04; ssj: 1764; Zhong 1996: 156; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 124;

tls:text.tls:line: (The feudal lords must) not act contrary to the command of the King by Heaven's Grace.

sense.def: the king by the grace of Heaven, His Heaven-ordained Majesty

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.06.06; ssj: 1565; Zhong 1996: 157; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 124;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke arrived from his attack on Wei.

sense.def: from 至自伐鄭

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.06.08; ssj: 1565; Zhong 1996: 157; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 125;

tls:text.tls:line: There were ming insects.

sense.def: there was a catapillar pest [Some might prefer to read this as a telegraphically used noun, as when someone writes on a shopping list "milk" and means to suggest "I should remember to buy mild."]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.06.09; ssj: 1566; Zhong 1996: 157; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 125;

tls:text.tls:line: a man from Chyi came to present precious objects from Wei.

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.07.06; ssj: 1765; Zhong 1996: 160; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 125;

tls:text.tls:line: take place at midnight?

sense.def: be

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.07.07; ssj: 1765; Zhong 1996: 160; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 126;

tls:text.tls:line: When we see something that falls and hits the ground,

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.07.07; ssj: 1765; Zhong 1996: 160; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 126;

tls:text.tls:line: then we may use the expression yeo ("it rains").

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.04; ssj: 1765; Zhong 1996: 163; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 126;

tls:text.tls:line: (The ceremony when the army) leaves is called chyr bing.

sense.def: troops, armed forces; military support; military force

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.04; ssj: 1765; Zhong 1996: 163; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 126;

tls:text.tls:line: It is an exercise in warfare.

sense.def: practise or exercise Ving; rehearse, in order to become good at (an art), practise

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.04; ssj: 1765; Zhong 1996: 163; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 126;

tls:text.tls:line: It is an exercise in warfare.

sense.def: engage in battle, give battle; be professionally engaged in an act of warfare [NB: giving battle is not a vi2. The use of 戰 with two subjects is actually not very common.]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.04; ssj: 1765; Zhong 1996: 163; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 126;

tls:text.tls:line: (The ceremony when the army) returns is called jenn leu.

sense.def: armed forces; army (of 500 soldiers?)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.06; ssj: 1567; Zhong 1996: 165; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 127;

tls:text.tls:line: (our) army and the army of Chyi besieged (the city of) Cherng.

sense.def: together with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.08; ssj: 1567; Zhong 1996: 165; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 127;

tls:text.tls:line: the army returned.

sense.def: get back, return home

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.09; ssj: 1766; Zhong 1996: 165; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 127;

tls:text.tls:line: The term hwan ("to return") indicates

sense.def: make an about turn and withdraw, turn back, head back; turn round in order to withdraw or return to where one comes from, or retrace one's steps

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.09; ssj: 1766; Zhong 1996: 165; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 127;

tls:text.tls:line: that the matter had not been concluded.

sense.def: be completed, be completely achieved; be completely understood; reach perfection

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.09; ssj: 1766; Zhong 1996: 165; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 127;

tls:text.tls:line: (Our army) withdrew.

sense.def: withdraw; go into hiding; live in hiding

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.08.11; ssj: 1766; Zhong 1996: 166; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 127;

tls:text.tls:line: (He) assassinated (his ruler) in order to succeed him.

sense.def: take someone else's place 四時相代

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.09.03; ssj: 1567; Zhong 1996: 167; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 127;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke and a great officer of Chyi made a covenant in Jih.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.09.08; ssj: 1766; Zhong 1996: 169; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 128;

tls:text.tls:line: The term guei ("to return") is used of a great officer

sense.def: flee

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.09.08; ssj: 1766; Zhong 1996: 169; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 128;

tls:text.tls:line: The term guei ("to return") is used of a great officer

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.09.11; ssj: 1568; Zhong 1996: 170; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 128;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) and the army of Chyi fought at Ganshyr.

sense.def: the contextually determinate N2 V-s (together) with N1; the contextually determinate N2 V-s against N1

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.09.11; ssj: 1568; Zhong 1996: 170; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 128;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) and the army of Chyi fought at Ganshyr.

sense.def: (fight a battle etc) with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.09.13; ssj: 1568; Zhong 1996: 170; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 128;

tls:text.tls:line: is an expression denoting ease.

sense.def: word; particle

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.09.13; ssj: 1568; Zhong 1996: 170; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 128;

tls:text.tls:line: may give protection to refugees;

sense.def: escape from; avoid by running away from; run away from, abscond from (difficulties, contracts etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.04; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 171; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 129;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore exercizes care and gives the month.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.05; ssj: 1569; Zhong 1996: 171; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 129;

tls:text.tls:line: the people of Sonq removed (the state of) Suh.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.05; ssj: 1569; Zhong 1996: 171; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 129;

tls:text.tls:line: the people of Sonq removed (the state of) Suh.

sense.def: move (an oject) to another place

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.06; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 171; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 129;

tls:text.tls:line: That the Text does not indicate the place

sense.def: mention the place; record the location of an event

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶未失其國家以往者也。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.06; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 171; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 129;

tls:text.tls:line: the removal (of the capital), while the state has as yet not been lost.

sense.def: nation

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.08; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 172; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 129;

tls:text.tls:line: (They) feared us.

sense.def: us (including the audience)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.08; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 172; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 129;

tls:text.tls:line: (They) feared us.

sense.def: our territory (inclusive)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.12; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 173; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 130;

tls:text.tls:line: When a sage (eventually) is established (as King),

sense.def: a sage; any sage (with tensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.12; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 173; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 130;

tls:text.tls:line: Under a weak Son of Heaven,

sense.def: a Son of Heaven, a certain Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.14; ssj: 1767; Zhong 1996: 174; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 130;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to explain the capture of the marquis of Tsay.

sense.def: the capturing (and possibly killing, of someone)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.10.15; ssj: 1569; Zhong 1996: 174; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 130;

tls:text.tls:line: The viscount of Tarn fled to Jeu.

sense.def: flee to (a place, typically another state)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.11.03; ssj: 1768; Zhong 1996: 175; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 130;

tls:text.tls:line: and to the fact Wann of Sonq was captured.

sense.def: the capturing (and possibly killing, of someone)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.11.05; ssj: 1768; Zhong 1996: 175; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 131;

tls:text.tls:line: (The ruler of Sonq) was the descendant of a royal house.

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.11.07; ssj: 1768; Zhong 1996: 175; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 131;

tls:text.tls:line: That the Text records this event is due to the fact that she passed through our state.

sense.def: my/our [territory]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.11.07; ssj: 1768; Zhong 1996: 175; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 131;

tls:text.tls:line: That the Text records this event is due to the fact that she passed through our state.

sense.def: our territory; our state; my state

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.12.08; ssj: 1570; Zhong 1996: 177; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 132;

tls:text.tls:line: Wann of Sonq left (his state) and fled to Chern.

sense.def: leave so as to flee to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.13.02; ssj: 1768; Zhong 1996: 177; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 132;

tls:text.tls:line: These were the marquis of Chyi and the duke of Sonq.

sense.def: this (particular concrete thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.13.02; ssj: 1768; Zhong 1996: 177; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 132;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text refer to them as "men"?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:text.tls:srcline:
宋人、
邾齊人、人伐郳。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.15.05; ssj: 1572; Zhong 1996: 1i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 133;

tls:text.tls:line: men of Sonq, men of Chyi and men of Juliuh attacked Yi.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:text.tls:srcline:
宋人、
齊人、衛人伐鄭。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.16.02; ssj: 1572; Zhong 1996: 1i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 133;

tls:text.tls:line: men form Sonq, men form Chyi and men form Wei atttacked Jenq.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:text.tls:srcline:
會齊侯、
宋公、
陳侯、
衛侯、
鄭伯、
許男、
曹伯、
滑伯、
滕子，同盟于幽。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.16.04; ssj: 1572; Zhong 1996: 1i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 133;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke had a meeting with the marquis of Chyi, the duke of Sonq, the marquis of Chern, the marquis of Wei, the earl of (p.134) Jenq, the baron of Sheu, the earl of Tsaur, the earl of Hwa and the viscount of Terng. They made a covenant in Iou.

sense.def: baron of 許男

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.02; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 1i4; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: On account of the fact that he (later) fled to Luu.

sense.def: come in flight, fleeing from somewhere come

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.03; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 185; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: it was necessary also to record the cause.

sense.def: should on all occasions, must absolutely, strictly have to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.03; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 185; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: was an artful man of the state of Jenq.

sense.def: eloquent, rhetorically smooth 佞人

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.05; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 185; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: If so, why does the Text not state that the men of Suey

sense.def: this being so, on the other hand...; if that is how things stand, then...; in that case, then...

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.06; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 185; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: This was to treat the enemy with contempt (c).

sense.def: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.06; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 185; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: This was to treat the enemy with contempt (c).

sense.def: treat with contempt; treat without special respect

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.07; ssj: 1572; Zhong 1996: 186; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: Jan of Jenq came as a refugee from Chyi.

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.07; ssj: 1572; Zhong 1996: 186; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: Jan of Jenq came as a refugee from Chyi.

sense.def: come in flight, fleeing from somewhere come

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.17.08; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 186; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: The term taur ("to escape") denotes an escape from a justified arrest.

sense.def: escape from; avoid by running away from; run away from, abscond from (difficulties, contracts etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.18.02; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 186; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: (p.135) the Kings pays homage to the sun.

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.18.02; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 186; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, even though he be the Son of Heaven

sense.def: be the Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.18.02; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 186; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 134;

tls:text.tls:line: There is necessarily one who is superior even to those

sense.def: be a feudal lord

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.18.03; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 187; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 135;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Son of Heaven pays homage to the sun

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.18.04; ssj: 1573; Zhong 1996: 187; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 135;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke persued the Rong to the west of the river Jih.

sense.def: go after, pursue, try to catch up with (and perhaps catch)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.18.05; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 187; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 135;

tls:text.tls:line: Having represented the duke as having personally led the persuit,

sense.def: go after, pursue, try to catch up with (and perhaps catch)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.18.05; ssj: 1770; Zhong 1996: 187; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 135;

tls:text.tls:line: the Text does not grant the Rong to come too close to our state.

sense.def: our territory (inclusive)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.19.03; ssj: 1573; Zhong 1996: 191; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 135;

tls:text.tls:line: Thereupon he made a covenant with the marquis of Chyi and the duke of Sonq.

sense.def: engage in V together with, or in alliance with all the persons in N1

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.19.04; ssj: 1770-1771; Zhong 1996: 191; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 136;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to conceal the fact that (the state of Luu) requested a convenant.

sense.def: work towards, as one's main aim

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.19.04; ssj: 1770-1771; Zhong 1996: 191; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 136;

tls:text.tls:line: How do we know that this was so?

sense.def: work towards, as one's main aim

tls:text.tls:srcline:
齊人、
宋人、陳人伐我西鄙。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.19.08; ssj: 1574; Zhong 1996: 192; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 136;

tls:text.tls:line: men from Chyi, men from Sonq and men from Chern attacked our western border.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.21.02; ssj: 1574; Zhong 1996: 193; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 136;

tls:text.tls:line: Tuh, earl of Jenq, died.

sense.def: 秦伯罃

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.22.01; ssj: 1574; Zhong 1996: 194; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 136;

tls:text.tls:line: there was a pardon of great offences (a).

sense.def: forgive; declare an amnesty for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.22.02; ssj: 1771; Zhong 1996: 194; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 137;

tls:text.tls:line: Syh

sense.def: forgive; declare an amnesty for

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.22.08; ssj: 1575; Zhong 1996: 196; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 137;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) made a covenant with Gau-shi of Chyi in Farng.

sense.def: the contextually determinate N2 V-s (together) with N1; the contextually determinate N2 V-s against N1

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.22.11; ssj: 1772; Zhong 1996: 196; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 137;

tls:text.tls:line: enquiries about the name (of the bride-to-be),

sense.def: to ask for relevant information about 問其故, 問他

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.03; ssj: 1772; Zhong 1996: 197; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: He was an interior minister of the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.04; ssj: 1575; Zhong 1996: 198; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke went to Chyi to see (the service at) the altar of the spirit of the land.

sense.def: go to N in order to V

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.04; ssj: 1575; Zhong 1996: 198; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke went to Chyi to see (the service at) the altar of the spirit of the land.

sense.def: sacrificial mound and pole used for sacrifices to the spirits of the land

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.05; ssj: 1772; Zhong 1996: 198; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: Shyh ("to regard") is used of ordinary events;

sense.def: ordinary, not beyond the expected, commonplace, normal

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.05; ssj: 1772; Zhong 1996: 198; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: guan ("to look at") is used of extraordinary events.

sense.def: ordinary, not beyond the expected, commonplace, normal

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.05; ssj: 1772; Zhong 1996: 198; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: is an expression used of unofficial matters.

sense.def: word; particle

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.09; ssj: 1772; Zhong 1996: 199; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: /C/ Why is the term ren ("man") used here?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.09; ssj: 1772; Zhong 1996: 199; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: When promoting the correct principles (among the barbarians) (the Chuenchiou) does not wait for a second criterion (b).

sense.def: a second case, a second instance

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.10; ssj: 1576; Zhong 1996: 199; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke and the marquis of Chyi had a meeting in Guu.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.14; ssj: 1576; Zhong 1996: 200; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 138;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) painted red the pillars of (duke) Hwan's temple.

sense.def: paint cinnabar red

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.15; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 200; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 139;

tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven and the feudal lords had black (pillars) and white plaster (between the pillars) (a).

sense.def: LUNHENG: greenish black

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.15; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 200; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 139;

tls:text.tls:line: To paint the pillars red

sense.def: paint cinnabar red

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.23.15; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 200; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 139;

tls:text.tls:line: To paint the pillars red

sense.def: pillar in front of the main hall, on the main platform in front of the main hall; but the term can also be used to refer quite generally to a pillar of any kind, including the structurally crucial zhù 柱.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.02; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 201; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 139;

tls:text.tls:line: in the case of the rafters (of the temple) of the Son of Heaven,

sense.def: an emperor; the emperor generally (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.02; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 201; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 139;

tls:text.tls:line: in the case of the rafters (of the temple) of the Son of Heaven,

sense.def: a Son of Heaven, a certain Son of Heaven

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.03; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 202; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 139;

tls:text.tls:line: and apply it to the ancestral temple

sense.def: 白之於君 prepositition after a ditransitive verb with an object

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.03; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 202; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 139;

tls:text.tls:line: and painted red the pillars of Hwan's temple.

sense.def: paint cinnabar red

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.11; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 203; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 140;

tls:text.tls:line: To marry the daughter and the younger sister of a feud enemy

sense.def: with whom one has a feud

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.12; ssj: 1577; Zhong 1996: 203; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 140;

tls:text.tls:line: the wives of the great officers of the same surname as the duke (a) were received (by duke Juang's wife), when they presented offerings of silk.

sense.def: clan, the overall clan; the leading clan; clan as united by ancestral worship and respect for the living representative of the ancestors

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.13; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 204; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 140;

tls:text.tls:line: great officers did not visit the wife (of the duke).

sense.def: pay a visit to (often to a superior), have an audience with; gain an audience with;

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.14; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 204; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 140;

tls:text.tls:line: The ceremonial gifts of a man

sense.def: person of male sex; often: adult male (suitable for military or civil service)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.15; ssj: 1773; Zhong 1996: 204; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 140;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore carefully records the day.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.24.17; ssj: 1577; Zhong 1996: 205; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 140;

tls:text.tls:line: Ji of Tsaur left (his state) and fled to Chern.

sense.def: leave so as to flee to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.02; ssj: 1774; Zhong 1996: 206; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: He was a great officer invested by the Son of Heaven.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.06; ssj: 1774; Zhong 1996: 207; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: he plants the five flags

sense.def: signal flag used by senior generals in military campaigns [similar to the previous, but smaller: SUN 1991: 152; ill.: SUN 1991: 38-7, 8] [JM]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.06; ssj: 1774; Zhong 1996: 207; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: A great officer beats at the gate

sense.def: knock against (mostly drums but also bells) so as to produce a sound; knock (at a gate)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.06; ssj: 1774; Zhong 1996: 207; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: and an officer beats the rattle.

sense.def: knock against (mostly drums but also bells) so as to produce a sound; knock (at a gate)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.06; ssj: 1774; Zhong 1996: 207; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: and an officer beats the rattle.

sense.def: (night-)watchman's rattle

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.06; ssj: 1774; Zhong 1996: 207; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: They are thus said to replenish the Yang force.

sense.def: to give content (to something); to accomplish; to make abundant; make one's presence felt throughout

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.09; ssj: 1578; Zhong 1996: 208; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: there were great floods.

sense.def: there was a big flood

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.25.09; ssj: 1578; Zhong 1996: 208; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: Drums were beaten and victims offered at the altar of the spirit of the land and at the (city) gates.

sense.def: at (a place)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.26.02; ssj: 1578; Zhong 1996: 210; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 141;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke arrived from the attack on the Rong.

sense.def: OBI 4: from 出自湯谷

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.26.05; ssj: 1578; Zhong 1996: 211; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 142;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke joined men from Sonq and men from Chyi and attacked Shyu.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.27.03; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 212; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 142;

tls:text.tls:line: From this (meeting) onwards they commended him (i.e. the marquis of Chyi) to the feudal lords.

sense.def: thereafter, from then on, from that point onwards

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.27.06; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 213; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 143;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to conceal the fact that (Yeou) left (his state) and fled.

sense.def: flight

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.27.09; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 215; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 143;

tls:text.tls:line: When a feudal lord marries a daughter to a great officer,

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.01; ssj: 1579; Zhong 1996: 217; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 143;

tls:text.tls:line: Men form Wei and men from Chyi fought.

sense.def: with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.02; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 217; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 143;

tls:text.tls:line: In battles (the opposing parties) are armies.

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.02; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 217; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 143;

tls:text.tls:line: In battles (the opposing parties) are armies.

sense.def: be

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.02; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 217; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 143;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text here refer to "men"?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.02; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 217; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 143;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to (p.144) belittle him (i.e. the marquis of Chyi).

sense.def: treat as unimportant, deemphasise

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.03; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 217; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 144;

tls:text.tls:line: Why so?

sense.def: treat as unimportant, deemphasise

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.03; ssj: 1775; Zhong 1996: 217; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 144;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore (the Chuenchiou) belittles him.

sense.def: treat as unimportant, deemphasise

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.08; ssj: 1579; Zhong 1996: 218; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 144;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke had a meeting with men from Chyi, men from Sonq and men from Juliuh and went to the rescue of Jenq.

sense.def: in Annals cancellary style: (unidentified) patricians of Npl; the leadership of Npl; often: an (unidentified) representative of Npl; representatives of Npl, sometimes military: the (military) men from Npl, the forces of Npl

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.11; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 218; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 144;

tls:text.tls:line: The profits of the mountains, the forests, the swamps and the marshes

sense.def: wealth, riches, resources

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.15; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 220; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 144;

tls:text.tls:line: (Luu) requested leave to buy grain from (another) feudal lord.

sense.def: a feudal lord; occasionally also count noun: feudal lord, as in SHIJI: 漢王部五諸侯兵 "the king of Han lead the armed forces of five feudal lords"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故舉臧孫辰以為私行也。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.16; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 220; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 144;

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore (the Chuenchiou) refers to Tarrng-suen Chern and considers (this mission) as his private journey.

sense.def: personal (preference, room), private, non-official

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.16; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 220; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 144;

tls:text.tls:line: it is referred to as "extreme deficiency".

sense.def: exigencies, urgent needs; urgent concerns

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.19; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 222; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: In times of old, taxes amounted to one tenth (of the agricultural production).

sense.def: (amout of) ten; unit of ten

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.19; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 222; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: Although there might be a succession of bad harvests, the people was not in destress.

sense.def: calamitious (of years) 凶年，凶器

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.19; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 222; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: (Now) after only one year of bad harvests the people suffered from famine.

sense.def: the (taxpaying) people (i.e. the entire population, particularly the common people like the peasants)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.28.19; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 222; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: The Superior man considered this wrong.

sense.def: gentleman 吾先君子

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.01; ssj: 1580; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) renovated and extended the stables.

sense.def: build anew: renovate; refurbish

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.01; ssj: 1580; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) renovated and extended the stables.

sense.def: build so as to enlarge what exists> extend, enlarge

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.01; ssj: 1580; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: (the duke) renovated and extended the stables.

sense.def: horse stable; occasionally: fodder house (for horse fodder)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.02; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: refers to stables (built according to) stipulated rules (a).

sense.def: exemplary; made according to the prescribed pattern

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.03; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: the taxes were reduced.

sense.def: tribute, offering

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.03; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: the taxes were reduced.

sense.def: tax claims; tax in the form of war vehicles, arms and armour, and/or an obligation to to render military service

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.03; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: and in (the following) Spring he repairs his stables.

sense.def: build anew: renovate; refurbish

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.03; ssj: 1776; Zhong 1996: 223; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: and in (the following) Spring he repairs his stables.

sense.def: build so as to enlarge what exists> extend, enlarge

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.29.08; ssj: 1580; Zhong 1996: 224; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: (We) walled Ju and Farng.

sense.def: and [no examples in LY]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.03; ssj: 1777; Zhong 1996: 225; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 145;

tls:text.tls:line: since the fact that he was unable to rescue Jang was considered a disgrace.

sense.def: consider it disgraceful that S

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.07; ssj: 1777; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: in order to express grief over the destruction of Jih.

sense.def: feel pity about the fact that S

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.08; ssj: 1580; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: and victims were offered at the altar of the spirit of the land.

sense.def: whole buffalo used in sacrifices

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.08; ssj: 1580; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: and victims were offered at the altar of the spirit of the land.

sense.def: sacrificial mound and pole used for sacrifices to the spirits of the land

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.09; ssj: 15i1; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and the marquis of Chyi met on the Luu side of the river Jih.

sense.def: 衛人及狄盟 N2 V-s, in conjunction/cooperation/interaction with N1 (In the following the first designates joint action, the second interaction: 叔孫豹及諸侯之大夫及陳袁僑盟。 公及楚公子嬰齊、蔡侯、許男、秦右大夫說、宋華元、陳公孫寧、衛孫良夫、鄭公子去疾及齊國之大夫盟于蜀。)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.09; ssj: 15i1; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke and the marquis of Chyi met on the Luu side of the river Jih.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together informally as if by chance and hold a meeting, hold an informal meeting

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.12; ssj: 1777; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: Why is he referred to as "men"?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.12; ssj: 1777; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) has a greater affection for the marquis of Chyi

sense.def: be especially fond of; appreciate more; like, show an emotional preference for; be psychologically more attached to (something, compared to others); sometimes specifically: have as a protegé

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.12; ssj: 1777; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: Why so?

sense.def: be especially fond of; appreciate more; like, show an emotional preference for; be psychologically more attached to (something, compared to others); sometimes specifically: have as a protegé

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.13; ssj: 1777; Zhong 1996: 226; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: In the Interior Hwan had no states on whom he could rely.

sense.def: reliable, that can be relied on; 因國 a state to rely on

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.30.14; ssj: 1777; Zhong 1996: 227; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 146;

tls:text.tls:line: The contribution (from Ian to Jou) did not arrive.

sense.def: tribute; offerings required by ritual

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.31.07; ssj: 1778; Zhong 1996: 228; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 147;

tls:text.tls:line: The superior man (wanted to) expess the danger (in which this involved him)

sense.def: gentleman 吾先君子

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.31.07; ssj: 1778; Zhong 1996: 228; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 147;

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore carefully recorded this.

sense.def: painstakingly, diligently, carefully; meticulously; unfailingly 謹而

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.32.02; ssj: 15i2; Zhong 1996: 230; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 148;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke of Sonq and the marquis of Chyi had a meeting in Liangchiou.

sense.def: (of several subejcts) get together informally as if by chance and hold a meeting, hold an informal meeting

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.32.03; ssj: 1778; Zhong 1996: 230; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 148;

tls:text.tls:line: It was not that (the marquis of Chyi) was unable to make the feudal lords follow him and that he under these circumstances went there.

sense.def: go to the contextually determinate place (often answering a summoning by a superior)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.32.05; ssj: 15i2; Zhong 1996: 231; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 149;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke died in the luhchiin.

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.32.06; ssj: 1778; Zhong 1996: 231; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 149;

tls:text.tls:line: It was correct (for the duke)

sense.def: living quarters; building with bedrooms; private chambers; imposing building with inner chambers

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.32.06; ssj: 1778; Zhong 1996: 231; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 149;

tls:text.tls:line: A man should die in purity

sense.def: person of male sex; often: adult male (suitable for military or civil service)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Zhuang 03.32.10; ssj: 1778; Zhong 1996: 232; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 149;

tls:text.tls:line: This was flight.

sense.def: flight

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.03; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 253; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: It took the lead in the extinction of Shiahyang.

sense.def: leader (should perhaps be n(post-N))

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.04; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 253; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: "Why do you not use your team of horses from Chiu

sense.def: be made to bud forth; be reared, be bred; be produced 屈產之乘 "teams of horses bred in Qū"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.04; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 253; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: and your jade from Chweijyi (as a bribe)

sense.def: circular piece of jade, (which could also be of stone), with a hole in the middle, the diameter of the hole being as large as the breadth of the ring around it. One of the liù yù 六玉 used in sacrifices to Heaven and Earth and the Four Directions, as well as in various formal court ceremonials.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.04; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 253; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: and request the right of transit from Yu?"

sense.def: lend out to N1 the commodity N2; grant (someone N1) the temporary use of (something N2), delegate out to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.04; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 253; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: "These are the treasures of the state of Jinn.

sense.def: precious possession; precious things; treasure of high personal, monetary, social or moral value 三寶

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.05; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: If he does receive our presents and grants us the right of transit,

sense.def: me 不吾反也

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.05; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: that would mean that we remove our treasures from an inner treasury

sense.def: then [I collect here the cases where I have so far not found it plausible or easy to attribute to shì a clear anaphoric reference.]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.05; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: that would mean that we remove our treasures from an inner treasury

sense.def: be

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.05; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: that would mean that we remove our treasures from an inner treasury

sense.def: take N2 from N1; take N1 from N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.07; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: "As to his character,

sense.def: natural disposition; personality, personal nature (not countable)趙歧2B6:孟子不悅其為人.

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.08; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: And furthermore, with these treasures immediately before his eyes and ears,

sense.def: pleasant playthings, beautiful toys

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.08; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: In am of the opinion

sense.def: reckon that N V-s

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.08; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke (of Jinn) then borrowed a way through Yu and attacked Guo.

sense.def: "borrow" (influence etc), borrow (right of way etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.09; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: "As for this envoy from the state of Jinn,

sense.def: 衛國

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.09; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke of Yu refused to listen to him

sense.def: 州公 Duke is not here an enfeoffment title of the Zhōu, but presumably of the Shāng (See 日知錄 p. 566)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.09; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 254; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: and subsequently received the presents and granted them transit.

sense.def: lend out to N1 the commodity N2; grant (someone N1) the temporary use of (something N2), delegate out to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.10; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 255; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: "The proverb says:

sense.def: proverb; sometimes also attributed to a place 宋人語曰

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.10; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 255; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: "When the lips are gone, the teeth will feel the cold."

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.10; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 255; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: Does this proverb not refer to this situation?"

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.11; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 255; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: Taking his wife and children he then fled to Tsaur.

sense.def: flee to (a place, typically another state)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.11; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 255; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: but the teeth of the horses have grown longer (e)."[joke]

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.11; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 255; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 161;

tls:text.tls:line: but the teeth of the horses have grown longer (e)."[joke]

sense.def: be the more V for it

tls:text.tls:srcline: 桓公委端搢笏而朝諸侯，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.13; ssj: 17i3; Zhong 1996: 258; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 162;

tls:text.tls:line: duke Hwan, wearing a ceremonial cap and robe, and with writing tablets inserted in his belt, summoned the feudal lords.

sense.def: (cause to go to court>) invite to the royal court, get to come to the royal court to show respect

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.16; ssj: 17i4; Zhong 1996: 264; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 163;

tls:text.tls:line: Here (the Chuenchiou) treats the marquis of Chyi in a manner that sets him apart, and regards him as an outsider.

sense.def: at this point (in a text, maybe construable as a "time")

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.19; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 2i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 163;

tls:text.tls:line: In order to express the excellence (of this covenant).

sense.def: declare beautiful, declare wonderful

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.19; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 2i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 163;

tls:text.tls:line: Once and for all the prohibitions of the Son of Heaven were made clear.

sense.def: completely, wholly; (before negatives) not at all 壹不知 "do not at all understand"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 5.10.3晉里克弒其君卓，及其大夫荀息。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.21; ssj: 1596; Zhong 1996: 285; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 164;

tls:text.tls:line: Lii-keh of Jinn assassinated his ruler Juo-tzyy and his great officer Shyun-shyi.

sense.def: and [no examples in LY]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.24; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 286; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "Might this man not intend to kill me too?"

sense.def: this (particular concrete thing)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.27; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 286; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "Since of your subjects none has a higher position than the heir,

sense.def: be of higher objective/official social status than 莫尊於

tls:text.tls:srcline: 女其將衛士而往衛冢乎？」

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.27; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 286; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: You had better command the guard and go forward to guard the grave!"

sense.def: go to a contextually determinate place and V, set out to V; be on one's way to (with a verbal (or subjectless sentential, if one prefers) object) 往拜之

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.28; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "I respectfully agree to do so."

sense.def: [I] agree respectfully to what has just been said

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.28; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "I respectfully agree to do so."

sense.def: obey the contextually determinate instruction N

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.29; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: The heir performed the sacrifice.

sense.def: offer sacrifice and prayer (typically in spring in order to obtain good harvest from the seed that is being sown)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.29; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: he presented the remainder of the sacrificeal meat to the lord.

sense.def: sacrificial meat and wine

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.30; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: Li-ji made wine from (the feathers of) the jenn bird

sense.def: be addicted to (wine) SHUOWEN: 樂酒也

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.31; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: must be sampled!"

sense.def: should by all means be V-ed

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.32; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "You (my son) and I have always got on well together.

sense.def: and 吾與汝俱不如也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 世子之傅里克謂世子曰：

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.33; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: Lii-keh, who was the tutor of the heir, spoke to him and said:

sense.def: grand tutor

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.33; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: If you do so,

sense.def: explain (onself), make (oneself) clear, make one's position clear

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.33; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: If you do not go in and clear yourself,

sense.def: explain (onself), make (oneself) clear, make one's position clear

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.34; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "My lord (and father) is already old

sense.def: be of great age; be old and frail; be senior

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.34; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 287; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: it is better that I myself die.

sense.def: allow myself to die

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.35; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 288; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: (And so the heir) cut his throat and died.

sense.def: ZUO Xiang 18: neck; cf. ZZ 197；throat

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.35; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 288; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "This man intends to kill me too!"

sense.def: 不免有殺身之禍have (someone/onself) killed; cause someone/oneself to lose his life, The general word, to be used about animals as well as humans (and occasionally about plants as well), for whatever cause or reason and with whatever means; (sometimes the killed person comes to life again as in ZUO 7.8.1.1)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.35; ssj: 1788; Zhong 1996: 288; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 165;

tls:text.tls:line: "This man intends to kill me too!"

sense.def: me

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.39; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 301; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 166;

tls:text.tls:line: The phrase "the same month"

sense.def: the same (year); that self-same (day etc)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.39; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 301; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 166;

tls:text.tls:line: In the phrase "six yi-birds flew backwards and passed the capital of Sonq"

sense.def: the capital city of Npr

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.40; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 166;

tls:text.tls:line: are (p.167) objects of no intelligence.

sense.def: awareness

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.40; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 166;

tls:text.tls:line: Since stones lack intelligence,

sense.def: awareness

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.40; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 166;

tls:text.tls:line: are of mean intelligence,

sense.def: awareness

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.41; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: Such is the superior man's relation to objects

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.41; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: Such is the superior man's relation to objects

sense.def: x之於y(也) "As for X's relation to Y,...

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.41; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: Even in the case of stone and yi-birds he gives completet descriptions.

sense.def: even (stressed)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.41; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: How much more, then, does he do so with regard to men?

sense.def: how much more in the case of N!

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.41; ssj: 1791; Zhong 1996: 302; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: The place where the people gather is called a capital.

sense.def: major administrative and ritual centre, local centre at the lower administrative level immediately below the state capital

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: (Its ruler) was steeped in wine

sense.def: be addicted to (wine)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: and lust.

sense.def: indulge wantonly in, dissipate oneself in

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: and lust.

sense.def: female beauty; male or female good looks; sex; sexy looks; female charms

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: The great ministers rebelled

sense.def: engage in political revolt

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: and the people turned into bandits and robbers.

sense.def: robbers

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: and the people turned into bandits and robbers.

sense.def: thug, robber

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: and the people turned into bandits and robbers.

sense.def: common thief, common burglar; criminals

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.46; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: Thus Liang

sense.def: bring ruin upon (oneself)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.47; ssj: 1793; Zhong 1996: 311; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 167;

tls:text.tls:line: the fact that the ruler was dissipated had not been worthy of mention.

sense.def: dissipation, overindulgence

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.49; ssj: 1604; Zhong 1996: 318; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 168;

tls:text.tls:line: the duke of Sonq fought with men of Chuu at (the river) Horng.

sense.def: with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.51; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 318; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: is regarded as a repetition of the disgrace at Yu (where the duke of Sonq was seized by the viscount of Chuu) (b).

sense.def: public humiliation, public disgrace; shameful episode

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.51; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 318; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: for the disgrace at Yu,

sense.def: of one's own accord, on one's own initiative, by one's own intention; intentionally

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.54; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 319; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: to repeat the same wrong,

sense.def: repeat (the same action)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.54; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 319; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: that is indeed to commit a wrong (d).

sense.def: A 謂之B: A is called B

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.54; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 319; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: It is duke Shiang that this refers to.

sense.def: 此之謂也 [note that the 也 is very rarely omitted]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.54; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 319; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: How could it possibly be said that one did so in order to avenge a disgrace!

sense.def: public humiliation, public disgrace; shameful episode

tls:text.tls:srcline: 宋公與楚人戰于泓水之上，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.55; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 319; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke of Sonq and men from Chyi fought above the waters of the river Horng.

sense.def: a place above (a river etc) 濮水之上, a place higher than; a place on high

tls:text.tls:srcline: 宋公與楚人戰于泓水之上，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.55; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 319; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: The duke of Sonq and men from Chyi fought above the waters of the river Horng.

sense.def: on top

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.55; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 319; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 169;

tls:text.tls:line: "A superior man does not protract the danger of others

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.58; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 320; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 170;

tls:text.tls:line: is revealed in his speech.

sense.def: language, speech [We need to find out when this word came to be used abstractly, as in 禽言]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.58; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 320; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 170;

tls:text.tls:line: Without this faculty of speech,

sense.def: if (often indistinguishable from AND - relative clause) GY: 王而飾之

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.58; ssj: 1795; Zhong 1996: 320; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 170;

tls:text.tls:line: Without this faculty of speech,

sense.def: who

tls:text.tls:srcline: 晉人及姜戎敗秦師于殽。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.60; ssj: 1613; Zhong 1996: 353; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 170;

tls:text.tls:line: men from Jinn and Jiang-rong defeated Chyn at Shyau.

sense.def: together with

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.62; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 353; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: Qín had to cross a thousand lǐ of dangerous territory,

sense.def: leap over, leap across (an obstacle); generally: cross (a road etc.; a border); go beyond

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.62; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 353; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and did not uphold the distinction between men and women.

sense.def: males

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.62; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 353; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and did not uphold the distinction between men and women.

sense.def: females; often specifically: unmarried and unbetrothed female

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.62; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 353; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171; revised tr. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and did not uphold the distinction between men and women.

sense.def: proper distinction made, segregationm also in practice as between men and women (contrast DIFFERENT)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.63; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 354; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: originates from the battle at Shyau.

sense.def: a battle

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.64; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 354; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: The earl of Chyn said:

sense.def: 秦伯third of the feudal ranks, 公侯伯子男，"earl"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.64; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 354; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: It would take two hands to grasp round the trees on your graves!

sense.def: be one span long, be one span in circumference 大拱'amply have the size of a span'

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.65; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 354; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: it will be below the mountain cliffs at Shyau.

sense.def: to be in; to be at; be conducted in/at (place or time)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.65; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 354; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: it will be below the mountain cliffs at Shyau.

sense.def: below

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.66; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 355; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: The earl of Chyn became angry and said:

sense.def: 秦伯third of the feudal ranks, 公侯伯子男，"earl"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.66; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 355; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: "Why do you cry over my army?"

sense.def: lament, wail about; conduct ritual wailing on the occasion of the funeral of

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.66; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 355; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: We are already old.

sense.def: be of great age; be old and frail; be senior

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.66; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 355; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: If those sons of ours do not die,

sense.def: these; them; the other party

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.66; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 355; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: we will be dead (when they return)."

sense.def: we, our party; we for our part

tls:text.tls:srcline: 晉人與姜戎要而擊之殽，

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.67; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 355; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: The men of Jinn and the Jiang-rong invited them (to battle) and beat them at Shyau.

sense.def: launch a vigorous attack on; strike out against

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xi 04.67; ssj: 17i2; Zhong 1996: 355; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 171;

tls:text.tls:line: Why does the Text refer to him by the term ren ("man")?

sense.def: call the contextually determinate omitted N1 an N2

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.02; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 377; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: When the ruler cannot keep a secret, his subordinates are silent.

sense.def: hide things, be secretive

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.02; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 377; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: When the subordinates are silent, the ruler is cut off from his source of information (a).

sense.def: hide things, be secretive

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.04; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 378; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: they made the good assist the wise.

sense.def: those who are human-hearted

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.04; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 378; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: they made the good assist the wise.

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.04; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 378; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: They did not make the wise assist the good.

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.04; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 378; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: They did not make the wise assist the good.

sense.def: those who are human-hearted

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.05; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 378; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: his consent.

sense.def: (Said by superior) [I hereby] approve [this]. All right! (Said by inferior) Yes!

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.05; ssj: 1806; Zhong 1996: 378; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: "I respectfully agree!"

sense.def: [I] agree respectfully to what has just been said

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.07; ssj: 1619; Zhong 1996: 379; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 177;

tls:text.tls:line: Hwu- Yih-gu left (his state) and fled to the Dyi barbarians.

sense.def: leave so as to flee to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.11; ssj: 1809; Zhong 1996: 396; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 178;

tls:text.tls:line: (Shu-suen Der-chern) cut off his head and loaded it onto a chariot.

sense.def: load into a vehicle; load up; transport, bring along; take along in a vehicle

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.12; ssj: 1809; Zhong 1996: 396; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 178;

tls:text.tls:line: If so, why does the Text not state that he captured (the giant)?

sense.def: this being so, on the other hand...; if that is how things stand, then...; in that case, then...

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.12; ssj: 1809; Zhong 1996: 396; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 178;

tls:text.tls:line: and did not capture the aged."

sense.def: person of a certain age with greying hair

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Wen 05.16; ssj: 1i11; Zhong 1996: 408; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 178;

tls:text.tls:line: (The Chuenchiou) does not allow one instance of arrogation to be followed by another.

sense.def: replace (something N1) by (something else N2)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.04; ssj: 1i14-1i15; Zhong 1996: 426; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: watching them as they tried to avoid the pellets.

sense.def: enjoy the sight how S

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.04; ssj: 1i14-1i15; Zhong 1996: 426; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: watching them as they tried to avoid the pellets.

sense.def: pellet; ball 丸二

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.06; ssj: 1i14-1i15; Zhong 1996: 427; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: I have no guilt!

sense.def: be innocent; be blameless

tls:text.tls:srcline: 孰為盾而忍弒其君者乎？」

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.06; ssj: 1i14-1i15; Zhong 1996: 427; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Who says that I, Duenn, was cruel enough to assassinate my lord? (b)"

sense.def: bear to V, endure V-ing

tls:text.tls:srcline: 孰為盾而忍弒其君者乎？」

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.06; ssj: 1i14-1i15; Zhong 1996: 427; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Who says that I, Duenn, was cruel enough to assassinate my lord? (b)"

sense.def: my

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.07; ssj: 1i14-1i15; Zhong 1996: 427; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Since upon your return you did not punish the assassin,

sense.def: seek out and punish; punish (for an offence); launch a punitive attack on

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.07; ssj: 1i14-1i15; Zhong 1996: 427; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: Since upon your return you did not punish the assassin,

sense.def: hired murderer; person who was hired as murderer

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.11; ssj: 1i15; Zhong 1996: 428; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: The injury was caused by the bull itself (a).

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.11; ssj: 1i15; Zhong 1996: 428; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i1;

tls:text.tls:line: The injury was caused by the bull itself (a).

sense.def: come into being for the first time, make one's appearance, appear on the scene

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xuan 06.15; ssj: 1i17; Zhong 1996: 439; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 1i3;

tls:text.tls:line: at noon, the burial could be performed.

sense.def: on midday, at noon

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.02; ssj: 1i23; Zhong 1996: 470; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;

tls:text.tls:line: (a) Jih-suen Shyng-fuu was bald-headed,

sense.def: bald

tls:text.tls:srcline: 蕭同姪子處臺上而笑之。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.03; ssj: 1i23; Zhong 1996: 470; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;

tls:text.tls:line: Shiau Torng Jyr-tzyy (d) stood in a tower and laughed at them.

sense.def: be located in (a place); find oneself in (a condition, at a time); occupy (a position or an office); place oneself (in a position or place)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 蕭同姪子處臺上而笑之。

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.03; ssj: 1i23; Zhong 1996: 470; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;

tls:text.tls:line: Shiau Torng Jyr-tzyy (d) stood in a tower and laughed at them.

sense.def: produce an audible sneer

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.03; ssj: 1i23; Zhong 1996: 470; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;
