tls:text.tls:line: who were displeased and left (the court).

sense.def: be dissatisfied with the contextually determinate thing, have objections to it

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.03; ssj: 1i23; Zhong 1996: 470; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;

tls:text.tls:line: who were displeased and left (the court).

sense.def: leave, go away; leave the scene

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.03; ssj: 1i23; Zhong 1996: 470; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;

tls:text.tls:line: They stood together and talked by the shiu-gate

sense.def: converse; engage in conversation

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.03; ssj: 1i23; Zhong 1996: 470; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;

tls:text.tls:line: on this account!"

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.04; ssj: 1649; Zhong 1996: 472; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 191;

tls:text.tls:line: they made a covenant with Gwo-tzuoh at Yuanlou.

sense.def: the contextually determinate N2 V-s (together) with N1; the contextually determinate N2 V-s against N1

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.05; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 472; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: (The enemy) set fire to the thatched roof of the Iong gate (i)

sense.def: burn up, burn down; set fire to; scorch

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.05; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 472; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: (The enemy) set fire to the thatched roof of the Iong gate (i)

sense.def: simple thatch

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.05; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 472; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: "Chyi was itself for a certain extent responsible for this situation

sense.def: 甚甚之辭"aggravating formulation"???

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.07; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 473; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: Make Shiau Torng Jyr-tzyy our hostage

sense.def: hostage

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.07; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 473; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: and order the farmers to make the field division run from east to west (j).

sense.def: active farmers

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.08; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 474; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

sense.def: agree to do the contextually determinate thing, say yes 唯而不諾

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.08; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 474; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: As for giving you Shiau Torng Jyr-tzyy as a hostage (this cannot be done),

sense.def: hostage

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.08; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 474; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: since she is the mother of the marquis of Chyi.

sense.def: then that concrete item...

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.09; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 474; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: To order our farmers to make the field divisions run from east to west,

sense.def: active farmers

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.09; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 474; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 192;

tls:text.tls:line: that is the same as ultimately giving you all the land of Chyi.

sense.def: THEN + SUCH> then in such a case; then such a person; then; then as for such behaviour; then this is; then this means that; then this leads to [Note that this is not claimed to be a word, just a collocation which it is useful to study.]

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.10; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 475; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: I beg leave to fight another battle.

sense.def: do it again; come again; commit an act a second time

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.10; ssj: 1i24; Zhong 1996: 475; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: I beg leave to fight a third battle..

sense.def: do the same thing for a third time; do something three times

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.13; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler of Jinn summoned Bor-tzuen (b) and asked him about this.

sense.def: summon officially; summon in; call in; deliver a summons (on behalf of a ruler), call in (on behalf of someone else); occasionally with abstract objects 召恥

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.14; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: On his way (to the court) Bor-tzuen met a man who pulled a cart.

sense.def: run into (a person)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.14; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: (and Bor-tzuen therefore) ordered his right-hand man to step down and whip him.

sense.def: to whip; to have (someone) whipped; whip a body part

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.14; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: you could have travelled a fair distance (c)."

sense.def: way in the sense of distance covered, or stretch to be covered; route

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.15; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: "My ruler has summoned me on this account

sense.def: summon officially; summon in; call in; deliver a summons (on behalf of a ruler), call in (on behalf of someone else); occasionally with abstract objects 召恥

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.16; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: Even if the ruler of Jinn summons Bor-tzuen, how can anything done about that?"

sense.def: summon officially; summon in; call in; deliver a summons (on behalf of a ruler), call in (on behalf of someone else); occasionally with abstract objects 召恥

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.17; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i2; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: whereupon the River will flow."

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.18; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: The ruler asked him, saying:

sense.def: ask interlocutor N and say: 問師曠曰

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Cheng 07.19; ssj: 1i26; Zhong 1996: 4i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 193;

tls:text.tls:line: and then the River will flow."

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.08; ssj: 1i43; Zhong 1996: 576; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 196;

tls:text.tls:line: that the roads within the court precinct be left unattended;

sense.def: court, royal court

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.11; ssj: 16i3; Zhong 1996: 5i3; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 197;

tls:text.tls:line: Joan, the younger brother of the marquis of Wei. left (his state) and fled to Jinn.

sense.def: leave so as to flee to

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.13; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 587; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 197;

tls:text.tls:line: The term huen

sense.def: eunuch gatekeeper

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.13; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 587; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 197;

tls:text.tls:line: and eunuchs.

sense.def: eunuch

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.14; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 588; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 198;

tls:text.tls:line: a ruler must not employ shameless persons,

sense.def: those who have no sense of shame (non-ref)

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.14; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 588; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 198;

tls:text.tls:line: a ruler must not employ shameless persons,

sense.def: the (proper) sense of what is publicly disgraceful, moral integrity

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.14; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 588; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 198;

tls:text.tls:line: show contempt for the enemy,

sense.def: treat with contempt; treat without special respect

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.15; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 588; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 198;

tls:text.tls:line: siginifies that the gate-keeper resented him.

sense.def: regard as an enemy, hate

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.18; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 590; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 199;

tls:text.tls:line: A man may be considered worthy

sense.def: in person, himself

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.18; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 590; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 199;

tls:text.tls:line: A man may be considered worthy

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.18; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 590; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 199;

tls:text.tls:line: he may also be considered worthy for the fact

sense.def: cause somebody contextually determinate N to V, make somebody N get into a certain situation, make somebody or something obtain a quality

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.18; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 590; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 199;

tls:text.tls:line: in that he honoured his lord.

sense.def: cause to be noble, elevate the status of; cause to be dignified

tls:line.title: 春秋穀梁傳(en)
tls:line.loc: CQ GULIANG Xiang 08.18; ssj: 1i46; Zhong 1996: 590; tr. Malmqvist 1971: 199;

tls:text.tls:line: (the Chuenchiou) represents Jih-tzyy's superior as having a share of his worthiness.

sense.def: elevated social status; venerable position
